40014023	Ni wute buagi tiqi nundony ruso pre dobu nikin irine rand pe newo no yenu di God pengu nindig. Ruso nginy naghe no yuram pudi ni irine rand pe tende yenu.
40014024	Muq tende puayi at te wuye ngamo mingine yequ pre, pudi nyumurighi naghe gherim seme te at choch nipiq niraq nandi.
40014025	Di yambgriq tumo Jisas rand pe pu nati ni, di wuye wamne nyinge nare nikin wute nde nondo.
40014026	Muq nikin wute ni muqoind, ni wuye wam nyinge nare nandi, ni quan nganye wune mamb, ni mari, “Nen wuye wariwo!” Ni wune mamb bu quan mari.
40014027	Pudi brequne ni simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi gre pu yequ. Wune wamb wayequ, ngene bu gadi.”
40014028	Muq Pita Jisas simbe nindig nari, “Yumbui, nganyene nganye nunonne ate nge gig ghari nge mune wuye wamne nyinge kare nunde godo.”
40014029	Ni nari, “Be ghandi.” Muq Pita ni at pe pu newo naghe wuye wamne nyinge nare Jisas nde nondo.
40014030	Pudi ni nyumurighi quan gre nand kin te nuqoind, wune namb, di wuye pe naghe no yamb. Muq ni Jisas ningg nari, “Yumbui, nge gheti kowi.”
40014031	Muq Jisas ni brequne si neq wondo nait nase, di ni ningg nari, “Nu nge musoqne nei gubigh! Pughe kin ningg nu nei tevi vise?”
40014032	Di ni temi mandi at pe mewo maghe, di nyumurighi opu prene.
40014033	Di wute at pe mas kin te ni yumbui nyamb mirang di mari, “Nganyene nganye nu God ningg wo.”
40014034	Di ni opu gri mowi mati, Genesaret nde qi pe mandi.
40014035	Di wute buagi tiqe te kin ni Jisas ruqoind rip no, di wand ri viso tiqe manyi Genesaret yeru kin te rutungu di wute num kin buagi rire Jisas nde rindi.
40014036	Di ni Jisas pengu rindig ei wute num kin ni rindi Jisas ningg chongo cheq te riting wuse ei ni num oghi ningg. Di wute buagi rindi chongo riting wuse kin te ni num oghi.
40015001	Parisi di wute Moses ningg lo wute bei meny kin Jerusalem pu Jisas nde mandi di pengu mindig mari,
40015002	“Pughe kin ningg nunon wute te koku mingg yumbo ur te gure mawo? Ni mari, beghi si wuye pap pre ei mir bad, pudi nunon wute ni si wuye map segine mir mand.”
40015003	Jisas ni oyi nindim nari, “Di pughe kin ningg nungoqi God ningg lo gure waq, di nungoqi non nuqo mingg chuqo tene yembe wundiny?
40015004	God ni nari, ‘Nungoqi nuyi numo ningg wand te irepene ei wutungu,’ di ‘Wuti tughe kiyi o kumo wand brequ nindiny tedi wi nati.’
40015005	Pudi nungoqi wute simbe wundiny wari wuti iri yumbo ninge kiyi o kumo ghav nindiny ningg, pudi ni simbe nindiny nari, ‘Nge yumbo nungoqi ghav guduq kin ren te God geg ningg kiping ruso pre.’
40015006	Wuti te ni kiyi ningg wand nutungu segi di ghav nindig segi. Te kin ningg nungoqi God ningg wand te meware ruso di nungoqi non nuqo mingg chuqo tene yembe wundiny.
40015007	Nungoqi wutaqu umbo pe nei brequ bre pu rise muq nange vingg wute rundoqu ninggne yumbo ur yuwon ye wand. Asi propet Aisaia ni nungoqi ningg nari ye te nganyene nand. Ni nari,
40015008	‘Wute men ni mim pe nge yumbui nyamb miragh, pudi ninde umbo pe nge nei mimbigh segi.
40015009	Ni nge yumbui nyamb miragh ye te ghav rindim segi, te pugri ni wute gri lo yembe mindiny kin te oyi God ningg lo kin pugri wute bei meny’.”
40015010	Di Jisas ni wute buagi te ningg nari ninde rundo di simbe nindiny nari, “Wutungu di nei pe wawo vis.
40015011	Yumbo dabo pu wuti nde rir ruso kin te ni unje rip segi, pudi yumbo pughe wuti nde nei pe pu riyi ri kin te ni unje rip.”
40015012	Muq nikin wute ninde mandi di simbe mindig mari, “Nu wand guad kin te ningg Parisi ni umbo brequ kuse kin te nu nei gubiny?”
40015013	Jisas ni oyi nand nari, “Yumbo buagi nge wuyi wam kin kuan nawo segi kin otiwo ni puate ane bi nawo.
40015014	Nungoqi ni si ware. Ni wute rar chukoq kin pugri. Wuti rar chukoq kin iri ni rar chukoq kinne aye iri ngim bei nindig, tedi temi ane mo ngamo pe ir maghe.”
40015015	Pita oyi Jisas simbe nindig nari, “Beghi kopuqu wand ven kin puate te bei yengu.”
40015016	Di ni oyi nari, “Pughe gri ate nungoqi mune nei wamb segine?
40015017	Nungoqi nei wamb segi bri, yumbo ninde mim pe gri ne righe ruso kin te mune umbo che nawo ruso.
40015018	Pudi yumbo mim pe simbe bad kin te nei pe pu rindi, di yumbo ren kin wuti unje rip.
40015019	Te pugri umbo pe yumbo ur buagi ren rise: nei brequ, wute mamb riti kin nei, wute ngam ruso kin wute aye ane rise kin nei, quayi nyumbueg ane segi segi rise kin nei, nyungu kin nei, wandoqi mand, di wute aye nyamb brequ mindiny.
40015020	Yumbo pugri kin te God nde rar pe wute unje rip. Pudi wuti si wuye nap segine mir nand kin te God nde rar pe unje rip segi.”
40015021	Jisas ni Israel mingg qi te si niraq, Tair di Saidon opu no.
40015022	Di Kenan kin nyumbueg ire tende wus kin wundi Jisas ningg wuri, “O yumbui, nu Devit ningg kuqo, nu nge yawo togh. Nge wo nyumbueg ququ brequ ninde ghimbi pe yenu di ni mai wuraq.”
40015023	Pudi ni wand ninge simbe nand segi. Di Jisas nikin wute mandi buid map simbe mindig mari, “Tiqi ndow wuso, ni beghi nde dobu wuwi wuri nyuw wup.”
40015024	Ni oyi nand nari, “God nge tiqi nundogh gadi kin Israel mingg sipsip ir ruso kin te ninggne bu gadi.”
40015025	Pudi ni wundi Jisas nde muange tingi sungomyu gure wuwo yimb wughe wuri, “Yumbui, nge ghav ndigh.”
40015026	Di ni oyi nand nari, “Beghi wo ni mir te nikin nyombui mepirany rundo riq kin te oghi segi.”
40015027	Di ni wuri, “Yumbui, te nganyene, pudi mir cham ni kiyi nde ede pe tende ir ri kin te nyombui riq yuwon ruany.”
40015028	Muq Jisas ni oyi nand nari, “Nyumbueg, nu nge quan nganye nei gubigh! God nu yumbo nei gubiny kin te puaq nand ye.” Di ni wo nyumbueg brequne mune oghi wuse.
40015029	Jisas ni tiqe te si niraq, wuye ngamo Galili qunambe nyinge nare no. Ni rand pe newo no, di tende nas.
40015030	Di wute buagi ninde rindi, ni wute nyinge brequ kin, di wute rar chukoq kin, di wute nyinge rengu kin, di wute wand mand segi kin, di num kin buagi aye te ane mitari mandi, Jisas nde muange tingi mawo ris, di Jisas sabi nindiny oghi.
40015031	Wute buagi ni ruqond, wute wand rind segi kin te mune wand rind, di nyinge rengu kin te mune oghi, di nyinge brequ kin te mune nyinge rire, di rar chukoq kin te mune rar rit, di ni te ruqond nei kumo rimb. Di ni Israel mingg God ni nyamb rindivi viyo.
40015032	Muq Jisas nikin wute ngam niram ninde mandi simbe nindim nari, “Nge wute ren yawo kutony, te pugri ni nge ane pas nginy temi ire pu, di ni mir segi. Nge ni mir ane tiqi gudony ruso yambu kari, eti ni ngimi rar ori riti.”
40015033	Di Jisas nikin wute Jisas ningg mari, “Beghi wuye di nyumo segi ye pe ven nde pas, di muainde ei bret pateri kin tuqui di wute buagi ren mir bag bab?”
40015034	Di Jisas ni mingg nari, “Nungoqi bret pughe gri pu rise?” Ni mari, “Bret 7-pela pu, di umo woju ninge ane.”
40015035	Di Jisas ni wute buagi te simbe nindiny qi pe ris.
40015036	Ni bret 7-pela pu di umo ane nateri, God chumbuai nindig pre, bir nawo di nikin wute te nem, di nikin wute mare mo wute buagi te meny.
40015037	Ni mir rind di mir rimbiq, di Jisas nikin wute ni mir cham te mune materi imbi pe mawo righe ruso di imbi 7-pela pu bre mand.
40015038	Wute quayi ni bret me kin te 4 tausen pela pu. Ni nyumbueg wo ane manyi mand segi.
40015039	Di Jisas wute buagi tiqi nundony ruso, di ni at pe newo no Magadan mingg qi pe no.
40016001	Parisi di Sadyusi ane Jisas maip mi newo ningg ninde mandi, pengu mindig ei ni wam kin yumbo ur gre kin ire bei nand muqond.
40016002	Ni oyi nindim nari, “Yuram nginy ambo newo tedi nungoqi wari prangi ngeri oghi.
40016003	Di burane wuye quari wumb nginy tu ambo viyo, tedi nungoqi wari muqdi nyumurighi naghe di wuye wundi. Te nganye nungoqi yumbo ur nginy tu pe kin te wuqond di nei wamb wuye wundi o segi, pudi nungoqi muq ven nde puayi kin yumbo ur te puate nei wumbiny segi.
40016004	Nungoqi muq ven nde puayi was kin nungoqi wutaqu brequ, God nei wumbig segi. Nungoqi nge yumbo ur gre ye ire yembe guduw ningg pengu wand bri? Nge yumbo ur gre ye aye yembe gidiny segi, pudi nungoqi Jona ningg yumbo ur te wuqond di nei wamb.” Muq Jisas ni si nare di ni nyinge nare no.
40016005	Jisas nikin wute nei gheri map bu bret mare segine wuye ngamo misiq opu gri mo mewo.
40016006	Jisas ni mingg nari, “Nungoqi rar wat yuwon, Parisi di Sadyusi mingg yis te ningg ei yeng wawo yuwon.”
40016007	Di ni kin kin wand mand mari, “Beghi bret ninge pare badi segi bu ni pugri puq nand.”
40016008	Pudi ni wand wand mare kin te Jisas ni nei namb pre, pugri bu ni pengu nindim, “Nungoqi nge musoqne nei wumbigh, pughe kin ningg wari nungoqi bret segi puq wand?
40016009	Nungoqi nei wamb segine bri? Wute 5 tausen pela pu di bret 5-pela pu me di imbi pughe gri pu mune wateri kin te nei gheri bri wap?
40016010	O wute 4 tausen pela pu bret 7-pela pu me di imbi pughe gri pu mune wateri kin te nei gheri bri wap?
40016011	Pughe ningg nungoqi te nei wumbiny segi? Nge bret ningg wand gad segi. Nungoqi Parisi di Sadyusi mingg yis te ningg ei yeng wawo yuwon.”
40016012	Muq Jisas nikin wute nei mamb, Jisas ni yis bret pe req wur kin te ningg yeng mawo yuwon ningg nari segi. Ni Parisi di Sadyusi mingg wand te ningg yeng muany yuwon kin te ningg bu ni simbe nindim.
40016013	Muq Jisas ni tiqe ire Sisaria Pilipai tumo tende nandi di nikin wute pengu nindim nari, “Wute riri nge, wuti God nde pu gadi wuti nganye kas kin, nge tughe?”
40016014	Di ni mari, “Wute ninge riri Jon wute wuye nap kin, ninge riri Elaija, ninge riri Jeremaia, o propet asi kin iri.”
40016015	Di ni mingg nari, “Pudi nungoqi pughe gri nei wamb? Nungoqi wari nge tughe bri?”
40016016	Saimon Pita oyi nand nari, “Nu Kraist, God nas nas roq kin ni ningg wo.”
40016017	Di Jisas oyi nindig nari, “Saimon, Jona ningg wo, nu chumbuai ghand. Ven nu wuti iri nei new segi, pudi nge wuyi wam nas ye nu nei new.
40016018	Di nge nu simbe guduw, nu nyamb Pita, di wet nen nde wam wute buagi nge nei rimbigh kin te kirur di gre pu yeru, di wute riti kin gre te ni nyinge ruwo righe kin tuqui segi.
40016019	Yumbo yumbo buagi God nde si nambu yeru kin te kin ki nu kew ye. Yumbo pughe kin nu qi pe ven nde segi puq ghand te nginy tu wam tende God ni segi puqne nand pre, di yumbo pughe kin nu qi pe ven nde ngiq ghand te nginy tu wam tende God ni ngiqne nand pre.”
40016020	Muq Jisas nikin wute simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi nge Kraist, wuti God naip ko wute kate ruwi ye, te kin ningg wute aye simbe wundiny wayequ.”
40016021	Tende puayi Jisas nikin wute waghine simbe nindim nari, ni Jerusalem no ei mai niraq, ni quayi kiyi di prist mingg yumbui di wute Moses ningg lo wute bei meny kin ninde si pe yuqo niraq di ni mi nati. Pre di nginy temi mo pre aye ningg di God mune nindingi newo.
40016022	Pita ni wand ven nutungu ni Jisas nitanyi temi kring mo kinne yemu, muq Jisas segi puq nindig nari, “Yumbui, te tuqui segi. Yumbo ren nunde ruwi kin tuqui segi.”
40016023	Jisas ni tindi nondo Pita ningg nari, “Satan, nu kring yo! Nu nge ngim imb kuagh ningg, te pugri nu God ningg nei pe wand guad segi, nu wute ningg nei pe wand guad.”
40016024	Muq Jisas nikin wute simbe nindim nari, “Wuti nge nde nawi ningg, tedi ni yumbo buagi qi pe kin te dob neny di nge mai kiraq kin pugrine ei niraq.
40016025	Wuti tughe nikin ghimbine nei nimbiny nimbiny di nati, tedi ni nas nas te kin nas tuqui segi, pudi wuti tughe nge ningg nikin ghimbi nei nimbiny segi di nati, tedi ni otiwo yuwon pu nas nas te kin nas ye.
40016026	Wuti iri nge dob negh, qi pe kin yumbo yumbo oyi quan nei nimbiny, di yumbo te kin yembe nand nand muq nati, tedi yumbo te pughe gri ei ni ghav rindig ye? Te tuqui segi. Ni otiwo yuwon pu nas kin te yumbo ninge pe wong nand tuqui segi.
40016027	Wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye nikin angelo ane mandi kiyi ningg gre pe yenu kin tende puayi di ni wute yumbo ur oghi ye rind kin te yumbo neny di yumbo ur brequ rind kin te mai neny.
40016028	Nge nungoqi nganyene simbe guduq, nungoqi ven yequ kin nungoqi kin ninge mati segine di wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni king kin pugri nandi muqoind.”
40017001	Nginy 6-pela pu mo pre Jisas ni Pita, Jems, di Jems ni kiqam Jon pugri pu nitami rand iri wam dobui nganye kin tende mewo mo nikinne tende mas.
40017002	Ni Jisas muqoind muqoindne ni tindi no aye gib namb. Ni quenge nginy ti nase kin pugri, di ni chongo quem rimb di ti nase.
40017003	Di Moses Elaija temi mandi Jisas ane wand wand yemu muqond.
40017004	Di Pita Jisas ningg nari, “Yumbui, beghi ven nde pas te yuwon. Nu ngiq ghand tedi nge baj yirbu teri ire pu ven nde yembe gidiny. Ire nu te, ire Moses te, di ire Elaija te.”
40017005	Pita wand nand nandne yenu wuye quari ti wuri kin wundi ni imb wup, di wuti iri wuye quari wam te pu ngam nare nari, “Nen nge wo, nge ni quan nganye yawo girag righe di chumbuai gidig. Nungoqi ni ningg wand wutungu.”
40017006	Jisas nikin wute wand ven mutungu, ni quan nganye wune mamb ni pombri mo ngawu mare mo qi pe mundub.
40017007	Pudi Jisas ninde nandi, nat mase nari, “Wes wewo, nungoqi wune wamb wayequ.”
40017008	Di ni rar mindigi kuyo rar mat, wute aye muqond segi, Jisas irine muqoind.
40017009	Di ni rand pe pu mati mi mi, Jisas ni yeri nindim nari, “Nungoqi wo wuti iri yumbo ur ren wuqond kin te ningg simbe wundig wayequ, segine ruso otiwo wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni nati pre di God mune nindingi newo.”
40017010	Di Jisas nikin wute ni pengu mindig mari, “Pughe ningg wute Moses ningg lo wute bei meny kin ni mari Elaija ei ye nawo nandi?”
40017011	Ni oyi nand nari, “Te nganyene Elaija ni ye nawo nandi di yumbo buagi sabi nindiny asi kin pugrine rise.
40017012	Pudi nge nungoqi simbe guduq, Elaija nandi pre, di wute ni ruqoind rip no segi, pudi ni yumbo puq meng yawo kurem kin te puq meng. Otiwo wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni pugrine ei mai reng ye.”
40017013	Muq Jisas nikin wute nei mamb ni Jon wute wuye nap kin ni ningg bu wand nand.
40017014	Muq ni wute buagi yeru pe mune mandi, wuti iri nandi Jisas nde rar ngimine sungomyu gure nawo yimb naghe nari,
40017015	“Yumbui, nge wo yawo tong. Ni ghimbi yuqo quan nganye nare, pripri ni rar ori nati, no wase pe ir naghe o wuye pe ir naghe.
40017016	Di nge nunon wute nde kitanyi gadi, pudi ni sabi mindig tuqui segi.”
40017017	Di Jisas ni oyi nand nari, “Nungoqi wutaqu God nei wumbig segi kin, di yumbo ur brequ quan kumo wand ye. Nge muq nungoqi ane pas nganye chiraq tuqui segi. Nge nungoqi mai quan nganye kare yambu kari. Wokuandi te ren wutanyi wandi.”
40017018	Di Jisas ni ququ brequ te ker nuang, di ququ brequ wo te si neri neyi ni no, di tende puayine wo te opu oghi nase.
40017019	Di Jisas nikin wute waghi grine mandi, Jisas ningg mari, “Pughe gri ate beghi ququ brequ te puaq baid no kin tuqui segi?”
40017020	-
40017021	Ni oyi nindim nari, “Nungoqi God musoqne nei wumbig pugri bu puaq waind tuqui segi. Nge nganyene nungoqi simbe guduq, nungoqi nge nei wumbigh kin nei te mastet yi wojiju kin pugri, tedi nungoqi rand nen ningg wari, ‘Nu ren pu yo tende yeru,’ tedi ni no. Yumbo ninge nungoqi imb ruauq segi.”
40017022	Jisas nikin wute ane mandi Galili irepene mikur, Jisas ni simbe nindim nari, “Wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas kin ni wute nde si pe mi nondo ye.
40017023	Ni mi nati, di nginy temi mo pre aye ningg di God mune nindingi newo.” Nikin wute wand ven mutungu di quan nganye yivany mare.
40017024	Muq Jisas nikin wute ane mandi Kaperneam, wute God ningg baj pe kin takis materi kin ni Pita nde mandi ni pengu mindig mari, “Nu non yumbui takis wong bri nindiq?”
40017025	Ni nari, “Te nganye ni wong nindiq.” Muq Pita baj pe nandi di Jisas ni ye nawo pengu nindig nari, “Saimon, nu pughe gri nei guab? Qi pe ven nde tughe king nde takis wong mand? Ni kin wo takis wong mand, o wute aye kin te takis wong mand?”
40017026	Pita oyi nand nari, “Wute aye kin takis wong mand.” Muq Jisas Pita ningg nari, “Tedi king nikin wo takis te wong mindiq segi.
40017027	Pudi eti wute God ningg baj kin takis materi kin men puq pem tedi ni umbo ker mawo. Nu yo, wuye ngamo pe umosungo yeq wughe, di umo ire ye wuwo kutaqwi kin te mim puaq nduw, di wet bidi tende wur wuse kin te taqwi raq yo ni yem, di nge nu temu ye God ningg baj kin takis te wong ndiq.”
40018001	Tende puayi Jisas nikin wute Jisas nde mandi mari, “Wute God nde si nambu yeru kin tende wuti tughe ei yumbui ningg nas?”
40018002	Muq Jisas wo iri ningg nari nandi, ninde rar ngimine teti pu yenu,
40018003	di ni nari, “Nge nganyene nungoqi simbe guduq, nungoqi nei ware witinde wokuandi kin pugri segi, tedi nungoqi wute God nde si nambu yeru kin tende war wo tuqui segi.
40018004	Wuti tughe ni wokuandi nen kin pugri ni wute nde si nambu nas, tedi ni wute God nde si nambu yeru kin tende yumbui nas kin tuqui.
40018005	Wuti iri ni nge nde nyamb pe wokuandi pugri ye iri neti nowi sabi nindig, te ni nge bu neti kowi sabi nindigh.”
40018006	Di Jisas ni mune simbe nindim nari, “Pudi wuti iri ni wokuandi nge nei rimbigh ye ren kin ire puq neny yumbo ur brequ gud, te wuti te wet yumbui gibe pe wuq wang gherim pe meweri naghe tedi yuwon.
40018007	Yumbo ur brequ kin qi pe ruwi di wute te ningg mune yumbo ur brequ rind te ningg ni mai yumbui nganye rire. Yumbo te kin rindi ye, pudi wute tughe ni puq men kin te ei ni mai yumbui nganye miraq.
40018008	Di nu si o nu nyinge ni puq rew nu yumbo ur brequ guad, tedi pend ghawo meghare viso. Te pugri nu si ire kuse o nyinge ire vise muq yo yuwon pu ghas kin te quan nganye yuwon. Nu si tengi ane kuse o nyinge tevi ane vise, di ni memeri wase awu kuso segi ye pe tende yo kin te brequ.
40018009	Di nu rar puq wew nu yumbo ur brequ guad, tedi bi waq meraq wuso. Te pugri nu rar irene wuse di nu ghas ghas otiwo kin te yuwon. Pudi nu rar teri ane rise di ni memeri wase wute brequ ye mo kin tende yo kin te brequ.”
40018010	-
40018011	“Nungoqi wuti wokuandi nen kin pugri nyamb segi kin iri perei wundig wari, ‘Ni nge ane tuqui segi’ puq wundig wayequ. Nge nungoqi simbe guduq, nginy tu wam ye angelo wokuandi yeng muany kin pripri nge wuyi wam nas ye ninde rar ngimine yemu.
40018012	“Nungoqi pughe gri nei wamb? Muq wuti iri ni sipsip 100-pela pu yeru di ire ir wuso, tedi ni pughe sin nen? Wuti te ni sipsip 99-pela si nare rand pe yeru di ni no ire ir wuso kin te meri nituw ye.
40018013	Nge nganyene nungoqi simbe guduq, muq ni sipsip te nundoq, ni quan nganye chumbuai nand. Ni sipsip 99-pela ir ruso segi kin te ningg chumbuai nand, pudi ire ir wuso kin mune nundoq kin te ningg ni quan nganye chumbuai nand.
40018014	Te kin pugrine nungoqi nuyi wam nas kin ni wokuandi ren kin ire ir kuso ni yambu nari.”
40018015	Jisas ni mune simbe nand nari, “Nimand iri nunde unje nap, te nu irine yo ni unje nap kin te simbe ndig. Ni nu wand nutungu, tedi nu nimand kueti nowi pre.
40018016	Pudi ni nu wand nutungu segi, tedi wuti aye iri o temi ghate mowi nu ane wo, te ei wand buagi ane irepene wutaqu tequ o tequ ire pu simbe wundig kin te ni nutungu. Te Moses ningg lo pugri puq wund.
40018017	Muq ni wand te mune nutungu yambu nari, wo wute buagi aye nge nei rimbigh kin te mune simbe wundiny. Di ni wute buagi nge nei rimbigh kin ni wand te mune nutungu yambu nari, tedi nungoqi Juda segi kin di wute takis materi kin puq wem kin pugrine wuti te nungoqi ane was segi puq wundig.
40018018	“Nganyene nganye, nge nungoqi simbe guduq, yumbo pughe kin nungoqi qi pe ren nde segi puq wand te nginy tu wam tende God ni segi puqne nand pre. Yumbo pughe kin nungoqi qi pe ren nde ngiq wand te nginy tu wam tende God ni ngiqne nand pre.
40018019	Nge munene nungoqi simbe guduq, wute temi ni nei irene rise di nge wuyi wam nas ye yumbo ninge ningg pengu mindig, tedi ni yumbo te nuam rise ye.
40018020	Muainde wute temi o temi ire pu nge nde nyamb pe mikur, nge ni ane tende pas.”
40018021	Muq Pita Jisas nde nandi di simbe nindig nari, “Yumbui, nge mand iri nge nde yumbo ur brequ quan yembe nindiny, di nge ni yumbo ur brequ nand kin te puaq gidig pughe gri pu ei gad? Nge puaq gidig 7-pela pu bri gad?”
40018022	Jisas ni oyi nindig nari, “Nge nu simbe guduw, 7-pela pu ghand segi, pudi 77-pela pu ghand.
40018023	Wute God nde si nambu ris kin ni wand ven kin pugri. Yabe king iri nas di ni nikin yembe ye ane wet bidi segine materi kin te mune sabi nindiny.
40018024	Ni wet bidi segine materi kin te sabi nand ningg yenu, wuti iri mitanyi mandi, ni wet bidi segine nateri kin te manyi mindig 10 milion kina kin pugri.
40018025	Ni wet bidi te oyi nindig tuqui segi, bu nikin yumbui nari ni di ni ngam di nikin wo di nikin yumbo buagi ane te wute nem wong mand. Ni pugri puq nen ei ni wet bidi segine nateri kin te oyi nindig ye.
40018026	King ningg yembe ye wuti te ni wand ven nutungu, di ni king nde tumone sungomyu gure nawo di nari, ‘Nge yumbui, nu nge yawo togh di nge ghimbi wagh. Wet bidi buagi nge segine kateri kin te nge oyi guduw ye.’
40018027	Di king ni yawo nitong, ni wet bidi segi nateri kin te oyi nand segi, king segi puq nindig di tiqi nundog no.
40018028	“Pudi wuti te nikin yembe ire iri asi ninde wet bidi 10 kina segine nateri. Muq ni no wuti te nait nase gibene naind, di simbe nindig nari, ‘Nu nge nde wet bidi segine kuateri kin te brequne di oyi ghand.’
40018029	Nikin yembe ire ni wand ven nutungu di ni sungomyu gure nawo di ni simbe nindig nari, ‘Nu nge yawo togh di nge ghimbi wagh. Nge nunde wet bidi segine kateri kin te nge oyi guduw ye.’
40018030	Ni wand te nutungu yambu nari, di ni nitanyi no taq naimb pu yenu ruso ni wet bidi te mune oyi nand.
40018031	Muq nikin yembe ire aye te muqond yivany mare, di ni mo wuti te yumbo ur yembe nindiny kin te ningg king simbe mindig.
40018032	Pugri bu king ni wuti te ngam nirang nondo, muq ni simbe nindig nari, ‘Nu wuti brequ. Asi nu nge ningg quanji guad bu nge nde wet bidi kuateri kin te oyi guad segine nge si keri ko.
40018033	Nge oyi nu yawo kutow. Pughe ningg nu oyi nu non yembe ire te yawo kutong segi?’
40018034	Di king ni quan ker nawo, nari ni yembe ye wuti te mitanyi mo taq maimb di yuqo meng ruso ni wet bidi buagi te oyi nindig.
40018035	Te kin pugrine nge wuyi wam nas kin ni mune pugrine puq nen, nungoqi nimand mai puaq wundiny segi, tedi ni oyi nungoqi mai puaq nunduq segine.”
40019001	Muq Jisas ni wand ren simbe nand pre, ni Galili si niraq no Judia opu wuye Jordan nisiny opu gri no newo,
40019002	di wute nganye buagi ninde dobu ruru di ni tende num sabi nindiny oghi.
40019003	Di Parisi ninge ninde mandi, ni Jisas maip mi newo ei muqond ni wand ire unje nap bri. Pugri bu ni pengu mindig, “Beghi lo wuri wuti nikin nde nei pe ni ngam segine puaq nindiq tuqui bri?”
40019004	Ni oyi nand nari, “Nungoqi God ningg wand buk pe vise kin te wuqond segi bri? Yabe God ni qi di yumbo yumbo buagi yembe nindiny kin tende puayi ‘ni quayi nyumbueg ane pu yembe nindiny,’
40019005	di God nari, ‘Puate te ningg bu quayi ni kiyi kumo ane si nare di ni ngam teri irepene ris, di ni teri ghimbi irene nganye rise.’
40019006	Asi ni kin kin ris pudi muq ni teri ghimbi irene. God ni teri irepene nawo righe, pugri bu wuti iri ni bir nawo ni kin kin yeru te brequ.”
40019007	Di ni Jisas simbe mindig mari, “Pughe kin ningg Moses simbe nand nari, quayi ni ngam puaq nindiq di nyumo raqe ur nindiq new pre di tiqi nundow wuso?”
40019008	Ni oyi simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi ngawu gre wand bu Moses nungoqi ngiq nunduq nungoqi ngam puaq wand ye tuqui. Pudi asi God ni quayi nyumbueg yembe nindiny kin tende puayi yumbo ur ren kin segi.
40019009	Di nge nungoqi simbe guduq, wuti tughe ni ngam quayi aye ane rise segi, pudi ni ngam te puaq nindiq di nyumbueg aye nitaqi, te ni ngam kin lo gure nuaq.”
40019010	Jisas nikin wute mari, “Wuti iri ni ngam puaq nindiq kin yumbo ur pugri ye ninde rise, tedi ni ngam ruso segi te yuwon.”
40019011	Di ni oyi nindim nari, “Wand ven wute quan buagine mutungu segi, pudi wute ngam mo segi kin te God ni wand ven nem ye.
40019012	Nungoqi wutungu, wute isis mas, ninge ni ngam mo segi. Ninge ni ghimbi kumo rire rindi kin tende puayine ghimbi brequ rise di wo mare tuqui segi, ninge wute aye ni ghimbi pend mawo di ni wo mare tuqui segi. Wute ninge God nde si nambu yemu di nikin yembe nei mimbiny bu ni ngam mo yambu mari. Wuti tughe wand ven natevi kin tuqui tedi ni ei natevi.”
40019013	Di wute wokuandi Jisas nde ritari rundo ei Jisas ni si neny riwo di God pengu nindig ningg. Pudi Jisas nikin wute ni wute wo ritari rindi kin te ker muany.
40019014	Pudi Jisas nari, “Wokuandi te rar wuqond nge nde rindi, segi puq wundiny wayequ, te pugri wute God nde si nambu ris kin te wokuandi pugri ye ni te.”
40019015	Di ni si neny riwo pre, di sunyi te si nare no.
40019016	Muq wuti iri nandi Jisas ningg nari, “Tisa, nge yumbo ur oghi ye pughe ye yembe gidiny ei nge kas kas te kin kas?”
40019017	Ni oyi nindig nari, “Pughe kin ningg nu yumbo ur oghi ye te ningg nge pengu gudigh? God irine oghi ye. Nu lo tungu, tedi nu God ane was chiraq kin tuqui.”
40019018	Ni oyi Jisas ningg nari, “Lo pughe ye?” Di Jisas nari, “Wute ghamb riti wayequ; wute ngam kin ane wase wayequ; nyungu ghand wayequ; wute segi wandoqi ndiny ghari ni unje rip puq ghand wayequ;
40019019	nuyi numo ningg wand irepene tungu; di nunon ghimbi yawo kurany righe kin pugrine wute aye yawo rany righe.”
40019020	Quayi ambonye te oyi nand nari, “Yumbo buagi ren nge puq ken ye, pudi yumbo aye pughe ye mune puq ken?”
40019021	Jisas ni simbe nindig nari, “Nu mune tuquine nganye kuas ningg, tedi nu yo yumbo yumbo buagi te yi rundo wute aye wong mand, di wet bidi te kin ghateri wute yumbo segi kin te. Nu puq yen tedi nu yumbo yuwon kin nganye nginy tu wam rise. Nu puq yen pre muqdi nge nde ghawi.”
40019022	Muq quayi ambonye ni wand ven nutungu, ni no quan nganye yivany nare. Ni yumbo quan rise ye te ningg bu ni yivany ane no.
40019023	Di Jisas nikin wute te mingg nari, “Nganyene nganye, nge nungoqi simbe guduq, wuti yumbo quan rise kin ni wute God nde si nambu ris kin tende nar no kin te yembe yumbui nganye.
40019024	Umo yumbui kamel puq munduw kin ni chongo rang kin nil gawo woju tende wur wuso kin yembe yumbui segi, pudi wute yumbo quan kin ni wute God nde si nambu ris kin tende rir ruso ye yembe yumbui nganye.”
40019025	Jisas nikin wute wand ven mutungu, ni puyene mand mari, “Tedi wuti tughe ei God neti nowi yuwon pu nas ye?”
40019026	Pudi Jisas rar neq wundo nuqond di nari, “Wute puq ren tuqui segi, pudi God yumbo buagi te puq nen kin tuqui.”
40019027	Muq Pita ni oyi nand nari, “Beghi yumbo buagi te si pare di nunde dobu pawi. Beghi yumbo pughe kin ei pateri?”
40019028	Jisas ni oyi nindig nari, “Nge nungoqi nganyene simbe guduq, otiwo qi urupui pe wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye nikin sia king yuwon ye pe tende nas kin tende puayi nungoqi, nge nde dobu wawi kin, nungoqi mune sia 12-pela pe tende was, di Israel kin wute tit 12-pela pu yeng wany.
40019029	Di wute buagi nge nde nyamb pe ni baj si rire o kise kiqam si rire o kiyi kumo si rire o wo o wuny si rire ye te ningg ni yumbo te kin 100-pela pu pugri riteri di otiwo ni ris ris te kin ris.
40019030	Pudi wute quan muq ni ye mawo kin te otiwo ni dobu mawi, di muq dobu mawi kin te otiwo ye mawo ye.”
40020001	“Wute God nde si nambu yeru kin te wuny kiyi kin pugri. Burane ne ni nyinge nare maket sunyi pe no wute ninge ningg nari mandi ninde wain wuny mbe yembe mand di ni wong nand.
40020002	Wute ninde yembe mand kin ni nginy iri yembe mand kin wet bidi mat rise kin ngiq mand, dobu di ni tiqi nundom mo wain wuny mbe yembe mand.
40020003	“Di 9 kilok pugri pe ni mune maket kin sunyi pe no, wute aye mune yembe segi pu tende yemu nuqond.
40020004	Muq ni simbe nindim nari, ‘Nungoqi mune pugrine wo nge wain wuny mbe yembe wand, di nge nungoqi tuquine wong guduq ye.’
40020005	“Di ni mo. Di 12 kilok mune no pugrine puq nen, di 3 kilok ni mune no pugrine puq nen.
40020006	Muq 5 kilok yamb tumo rind rind ni mune maket sunyi pe no, wute ninge tende yemu nuqond, di ni simbe nindim nari, ‘Pughe kin ningg nungoqi ren nde segine yequ ruso ruso yuram?’
40020007	“Ni oyi mindig mari, ‘Pudi wuti iri beghi yembe ningg wand nuangu segi.’ Ni oyi nindim nari, ‘Nungoqi mune pugrine wo, nge wain wuny mbe yembe wand.’
40020008	Di yuram wuny kiyi nandi, wute yembe mand kin te ni yeng nuam kin te simbe nindig nari, ‘Nu wute yembe ye te ngam ram mandi, wong ghand. Dobu pu mandi yembe mand kin te gri ye ghawo wong ghand ruso ruso asi ye mawo mandi yembe mand kin te mune wong ghand.’
40020009	Di wute 5 kilok yuram yembe mand kin ni mune wet bidi nginy iri kin pugrine materi.
40020010	Muq wute asine ye mawo yembe mand kin ni mari ni muqdi wet bidi quan ei mat rise ye. Pudi ni ire ire nginy iri yembe mand kin wet bidi pugrine mat rise.
40020011	Di ni te materi muqond, ni wuny kiyi wand kumo mindig mari,
40020012	‘Wute men nu dobu pu kuari mandi aua irene yembe mand. Beghi burane ne badi yembe bad ruso ruso nginy naghe no, nginy wase mingi tende beghi yembe bad kin te beghi wong gudumu kin te ni wong guad kin ane tuquine.’
40020013	“Pudi wuny kiyi ni kin iri oyi nindig nari, ‘Mand, nu tungu, nge nu unje kaip segi. Nu nginy iri yembe guad kin wet bidi te ningg asi wand bad di nu ngiq guad pre.
40020014	Nu wet bidi ghateri di nambu yo. Nge ngeningne wuti dobu nawi kin nen nu wet bidi kew kin pugrine ni mune geg.
40020015	Te nge te wet bidi. Ngening nde nei pe wet bidi bir kawo nungoqi keuq ye. Nge wute men nde tumb kare ningg te piyi, pughe kin ningg nu te ningg kuari’?”
40020016	“Te kin pugrine wute dobu mawi kin te otiwo ye mawo, di ye mawo kin te otiwo dobu mawi.”
40020017	Di Jisas ni Jerusalem newo no, nikin wute 12-pela pu waghine nitamine no nikinne yemu di simbe nindim nari,
40020018	“Muq beghi Jerusalem pewo po, di wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni prist mingg yumbui di wute Moses ningg lo wute bei meny ye ninde si pe mi nondo ye. Di ni mari ni nati puq mand,
40020019	di wute Juda segi kin ninde si pe mi nondo, ei wute Juda segi kin ni wand peq mindig, di yas muang, di kruse pe qungu mi nati. Pudi nginy temi mo pre aye ningg di God ni mune nindingi newo.”
40020020	Tende dobu Sebedi ningg quayi wo temi ni kumo ane Jisas nde rindi. Di ni rar ngimine sungomyu gure wuwo yimb wughe, di ni yumbo ninge ningg pengu wundig.
40020021	Di Jisas nari, “Nu yumbo pughe kin ningg kuari?” Ni oyi wundig wuri, “Nu nge simbe ndigh, nge wo temi men otiwo nu king ningg ghas di ni temi anene nyamb yumbui mare, iri nunde si nganye pe opu nas di iri nunde si qaqi pe opu nas.”
40020022	Pudi Jisas oyi nand nari, “Nungoqi yumbo pengu wand kin te nei wamb segi. Nungoqi kap nge wuye ke kin te ningg wuye we tuqui bri?” Ni temi oyi mand mari, “Beghi tuqui.”
40020023	Ni oyi nindim nari, “Nungoqi nge wuye ke kin kap te ninggne wuye we ye, pudi nge nde si tuan pe o si qaqi pe was kin te nge gri nungoqi sunyi te keuq tuqui segi. Sunyi ren te wute tughe nge wuyi sunyi te nipim ruso pre ye ni te.”
40020024	Muq Jisas nikin wute aye 10-pela pu wand ren mutungu, di ni Sebedi ningg wo temi te ningg ker mawo.
40020025	Pudi Jisas ni quan buagine nari mondo di simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi nei wamb te pugri wute Juda segi kin ni mingg yumbui ningg mas ye ni quan nganye yumbui mas di wute buagi ninde si nambu ris ningg mari. Di ni nikin wute nyamb kin te ni buid map ei wute buagi ni mingg wand irepene rutungu.
40020026	Nungoqi ni puq men kin pugri puq wen wayequ. Pudi nungoqi kin wuti iri ni yumbui nas ningg nari, te ni nungoqi ningg yembe ye wuti kin pugri ei nas.
40020027	Di wuti iri ni ye nawo ningg nari, te nungoqi nde taq pu yenu yembe ye wuti te kin pugri ei nas.
40020028	Te kin pugrine wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni wute ni ningg yembe rindig ningg nandi segi, pudi ni oyi wute nde yembe nand ningg nandi, di ni nati ei wute nganye buagi ir pu ris ningg wong nand.”
40020029	Jisas nikin wute ane Jeriko si miraq mo, muq wute nganye buagi ninde dobu ruru.
40020030	Di tende puayi wute temi rar brequ kin ngim qunambe tende mas, ni mutungu Jisas te gri nandi, muq ni temi mari, “Yumbui, Devit ningg kuqo, nu beghi yawo tongu.”
40020031	Wute buagi ni temi ker ruam di simbe rindim ei ni temi wand segi mas. Pudi ni temi mune quan kumo mari, “Yumbui, Devit ningg kuqo, beghi yawo tongu.”
40020032	Di Jisas yenu di ni temi ningg nari, “Nge nungoqi pughe sin keuq ningg wari?”
40020033	Ni oyi mindig mari, “Yumbui, beghi rar pat yumbo buqod ningg pari.”
40020034	Di Jisas ni temi yawo nitom si natekui rar nitim rise di brequne ni temi rar mune oghi rar mat yumbo muqond, di ninde dobu maru.
40021001	Muq ni Jerusalem tumo mondo di ni tiqe Betpage tende mondo. Di ni nyumo oliv yemu kin rand qunambe tende yemu, di Jisas nikin wute temi yeri nindim pre tiqi nundom mo,
40021002	di simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi tequ tiqe tumo te yequ kin tende wo. Nungoqi tiqe te ningg warne wondo di donki ire wuq muaw pu wo ane tende yeru wuqond ye. Sare bure wand di teri wutari nge nde wandi.
40021003	Wuti iri nungoqi segi puq nunduq, nungoqi simbe wundig wari, ‘Yumbui ni yembe rise.’ Puq wand di ni brequne ngiq nand di wutari wandi ye.”
40021004	Yumbo ur ren kin ruwi kin asi propet iri ni simbe nand kin ane tuquine. Ni nari,
40021005	“Wand ven wute Jerusalem kin simbe ndiny, ‘Wuqond, nungoqi king nungoqi nde nandi. Ni nandi kin wuti nyamb segi kin pugri, donki pe nas di nandi, di donki wo pe nandi’.”
40021006	Jisas nikin wute mo, di Jisas nari kin pugrine puq men.
40021007	Di ni temi donki kumo di wo ane mitari mandi, chongo dobui donki wam mawo pre, Jisas newo nas.
40021008	Wute nganye buagi nikin chongo dobui ngimne ruwo ruwo rire ruso di ninge nyumo muange ngimne ruwo rise.
40021009	Wute ninge ye ruwo, ninge Jisas nde dobu ruwi, quan buagine pugri riri, “Devit ningg kuqo Hosana puq wundig. God nu wuti Yumbui nde nyamb pe nandi kin nen yuwon wang. Yumbui wam nganye nas kin ni nyamb wundivi viyo.”
40021010	Jisas ni Jerusalem nar no, wute buagi tiqe yumbui tende ris kin ni puyene rind, ni kin kin pengu rind riri, “Wuti nen tughe?”
40021011	Di wute buagi riri, “Wuti nen propet iri, Jisas puq mindig kin, tiqe Nasaret Galili opu kin.”
40021012	Di Jisas ni God ningg baj imb wabe nar no, di wute God ningg baj pe yumbo wong mand di maket muaq kin te bub nare mo. Wute ninge mas wet bidi kantri aye kin materi di ni mingg wet bidi te oyi mem. Di Jisas nandi wute men ni tebol te groq nindim ruso, di wute wapi mabri mawo mas wong mand kin ni mas kin komboiq te pombri nipim ruso.
40021013	Ni simbe nindim nari, “God ningg wand rise kin buk pe God pugri puq nand, ‘Nge ningg baj te wute nge ane wand ye baj puq munduw ye.’ Pudi nungoqi wute nyungu kin suqo mo ye sunyi kin pugri puq wew.”
40021014	Di wute rar rit segi kin di wute nyinge brequ kin ritari rindi God ningg baj pe, di Jisas ni sabi nindiny oghi.
40021015	Pudi prist mingg yumbui di wute Moses ningg lo wute bei meny kin ni yumbo ur oghi ye Jisas yembe nindiny kin te muqond, di wokuandi God ningg baj pe pugri riri, “Nungoqi Devit ningg kuqo Hosana puq wundig!” Pugri bu ni Jisas ningg ker mawo,
40021016	di ni simbe mindig mari, “Nu kutungu wo ren pughe puq rind?” Di Jisas oyi nindim nari, “Nge kutungu ye! Nungoqi God ningg buk te wundoq segi bri? God ningg buk pugri puq wund wuri, ‘Wokuandi di wo kumo miny reny riq kin nikin mim pe Yumbui nyamb rindivi viyo’.”
40021017	Di Jisas ni si nare, tiqe ire Betani puq munduw kin tende no, bur ire te nas.
40021018	Burane Jisas mune Jerusalem no, ni no no ngimi mir gureg.
40021019	Di ni nyumo fig ngim qunambe yenu nuqoind, be ni nondo tumo nuqond di fig yi segi, raqene rise. Di ni nyumo te ningg nari, “Nunde gidaqi pe yi mune riyi segi ye!” Di nyumo fig te brequne quari namb.
40021020	Jisas nikin wute te muqond, ni nei kumo mamb mari, “Pughe gri ate nyumo fig nen brequne quari namb?”
40021021	Di Jisas oyi nindim nari, “Nge nganyene nganye simbe guduq, nungoqi Yumbui nei wumbig di nungoqi nei tevi tevi vise segi, tedi nge nyumo fig puq geg kin pugrine nungoqi mune puq wen ye tuqui. Di ren ne segi, pudi nungoqi rand nen ningg wari, ‘Nu yo gherim pe ir yaghe,’ tedi yumbo nungoqi wari kin pugrine puq ren.
40021022	Nungoqi Yumbui nei wumbig, tedi yumbo pughe kin ningg ni pengu wundig di nungoqi wateri.”
40021023	Di Jisas ni God ningg baj kin imb pe nar no, wute wand bei neny neny yenu, prist mingg yumbui di quayi kiyi ane mandi ni muqoind di mari, “Nu beghi simbe ndug, nu gre pughe ye pe yumbo ren yembe gudiny? Tughe nu ngiq nunduw bu nu yembe ren guad?”
40021024	Jisas oyi nindim nari, “Muq nge oyi mune pengu ire nungoqi pengu guduq, di nungoqi nge simbe wundigh tedi nge oyi simbe guduq tughe nge ngiq nindigh bu nge yembe ren gad.
40021025	Jon ni tughe nde gre nateri di ni wute wuye nap? God nde pu nateri o wute nde pu nateri.” Di ni kin kin wand mand mari, “Beghi pari God nde pu nateri, tedi ni beghi ningg nari, ‘Pughe kin ningg nungoqi Jon ningg wand te wutungu di nganyene puq wand segi?’
40021026	Pudi beghi pari, ‘Wute nde,’ tedi beghi wute buagi te wune bibiny. Te pugri wute buagi riri Jon ni propet iri.”
40021027	Te ningg di ni oyi mand kin mari, “Beghi nei bab segi.” Jisas nari, “Nge mune pugrine, nge tughe nde gre pe yumbo ren yembe gidiny kin te nungoqi simbe guduq segi.”
40021028	“Nungoqi pughe gri nei wamb? Wuti iri ni quayi wo temi mas, di ni no wo kiseyu te simbe nindig nari, ‘Nge wo, nu muq yo wain wuny mbe yembe ghand.’
40021029	Di ni oyi nand nari, ‘Nge ko yambu kari.’ Pudi dobu pu ni nei nare nitinde di ni no.
40021030	Di kiyi ni no wo kiqam nde te mune pugrine puq nen, di oyi nand nari, ‘Yumbui, nge ko ye.’ Pudi ni no segi.
40021031	Nungoqi pughe gri nei wamb, wo pughe ye bu kiyi ningg wand nutungu?” Ni mari, “Ni wo kiseyu.” Jisas ni wute te simbe nindim nari, “Nge nganyene nganye nungoqi simbe guduq, wute takis materi kin di ngimne nyumbueg ane ni ye ruwo God nde si nambu ris di nungoqi oyi dobu waru.
40021032	Jon ni nandi kin ngim tuquine ye bei neuq, pudi nungoqi ni wand te wutungu segi. Pudi wute takis materi kin di ngimne nyumbueg ane ni ningg wand rutungu. Di muq nungoqi ren wuqond, pudi nungoqi nei ware witinde di ni ningg wand wutungu segi.”
40021033	“Nungoqi kopuqu wand aye ven mune wutungu. Wuti iri ni wain wuny ire yembe nindiny. Ni undaw nipiq, wain yembe mindig kin sunyi ire tende wabe gri ngamo nuaq, di baj dobui wute mas wuny yeng muany kin iri tende yembe nindig. Ni pre nand di wute aye nem di ni ber manyine wong maind maind mas, di ni wonji tiqe aye pe no.
40021034	Wain yi uri mand kin tende puayi ni yembe ye wute ninge tiqi nundom mo, wute ni wuny yeng muany kin te muqond di wain yi ninge map.
40021035	Pudi wute wuny yeng muany kin ni yembe ye te iri pug mindig, iri mi nati, di iri wet memirang.
40021036	Muq ni wute yembe ye aye mune tiqi nundom mo, asi kin quan segi muq quan nganye. Di ni mune pugrine puq mem.
40021037	Tende dobu nikin wo nganye tiqi nundog ninde no, ni nari, ‘Ni nge wo ningg wand mutungu ye.’
40021038	Pudi wuny yeng muany kin ni wo te muqoind, ni kin kin wand wand mare mari, ‘Wuti nen ei ni kiyi ningg yumbo yumbo buagi nateri ye. Beghi pi nati, ei ni ningg yumbo yumbo te beghi oyi pateri.’
40021039	Pugri bu ni mait nase, mitanyi mo wuny dabo memeri nar no di mi nati.
40021040	Nungoqi pughe gri nei wamb? Wuny kiyi nandi di wute wuny yeng muany kin pughe sin bri nem?”
40021041	Ni oyi mindig mari, “Ni wute brequ kin te suquan moyi gri ni mati, di wain wuny te wute aye nem yeng muany, di otiwo mir rise uri rind kin tende puayi di ni mir materi wuny kiyi meng rir.”
40021042	Jisas ni oyi nindim nari, “Nungoqi God ningg wand buk pe vise kin ven wuqond segi bri? Wand ven te: ‘Wet te asi wute baj yembe mand ye mari brequ di kring maip no kin wet te muq baj mingine nas di baj nare. Yumbui ni ren kin puq nen di beghi nde rar pe yuwon nganye.’
40021043	“Pugri bu nge nungoqi simbe guduq, nungoqi God nde si nambu yequ kin te ningg God ni segi puq nunduq, di ni oyi wute aye ni wand rutungu kin te ngiq nindiny.
40021044	Di wuti tughe ni wam pu ir ni naghe wet pe yenu, tedi ni bir nas puch puch yenu. Pudi wet oyi ir ni wuti dang naind, tedi wuti te binye nase.”
40021045	Prist mingg yumbui di Parisi ane ni kopuqu wand ven mutungu, ni nei mamb Jisas ni mingg bu simbe nand.
40021046	Ni mait nase ningg nei mamb, pudi ni wute buagi wune mimbiny. Te pugri wute ni riri Jisas ni propet iri.
40022001	Muq munene Jisas ni kopuqu wand pe wute simbe nindiny,
40022002	“Wute God nde si nambu yeru kin te pugri, king iri ni wo ngam urupui no kin mir yembe nindig.
40022003	Ni wute ninge simbe nindiny otiwo ni wo ngam urupui no kin te mir mawo kin tende puayi di ni rindi. Muq ni mir rind kin puayi nikin yembe ye wute te tiqi nundom mo wute simbe mindiny rindi ningg, pudi ni rindi yambu riri.
40022004	Muq nikin yembe ye aye mune tiqi nundom mo simbe nindim nari, ‘Wute nge simbe gidiny rindi puq gad kin te simbe wundiny, “Nungoqi wutungu, nge mir yembe gidiny pre pu rise, bulmakau quayi buagi di bulmakau wo buagi nyam rire kin nge gab riti pre. Yumbo yumbo buagi nge yembe gidiny pre, nungoqi ngam kin mir pene wandi”.’
40022005	“Yembe ye wute mo ni simbe mindiny, pudi ni rutungu yambu riri, di ni aye pe ruso. Iri ni no wuny yembe nand, di iri ni no bisnis yembe nand.
40022006	Pudi ninge king ningg yembe ye te mat mase pug mindim di mi mati.
40022007	King ni umbo ker nawo, di ni ami tiqi nundom mo, wute nikin yembe ye mi mati kin te mi di ni tiqe te mindany nimbiny.
40022008	Muq ni yembe ye aye simbe nindim nari, ‘Ngam kin mir nge yembe gidiny pre pu rise, pudi wute nge simbe gidiny kin ni wute oghi segi bu ni rindi segi.
40022009	Nungoqi tiqe manyi te wo wute pughe ye wuqond simbe wundiny ngam kin mir pe rindi.’
40022010	“Muq nikin yembe ye tiqi nundom mo wute buagi ni ngimne muqond mate ruwi, oghi kin di brequ kin, buagi ane mate ruwi riso, di mir kin sunyi te wutene bre.
40022011	Pudi king ni neyi nandi wute te nuqond, di ni wuti iri ngam kin chongo oghi nganye nare righe segi kin te nuqoind.
40022012	Ni pengu nindig nari, ‘Nge mand, pughe gri ate nu ngam kin chongo oghi nganye kuare righe segine ven nde kueyi kui?’ Muq wuti te wand segine yenu.
40022013	Muq king nikin yembe ye simbe nindim nari, ‘Si muange taq wumbig, meweri dabo burpoq pe nar no. Tende wute quan nganye riri di sawo rit ki.’
40022014	Te pugri wute nganye buagi ngam nirany, pudi ire irene ni nate ruwi.”
40022015	Parisi ni mo kin kinne wand taq mamb pughe gri ei wandoqi mindig di ni wand ninge unje nap tedi mait nase.
40022016	Di Parisi nikin wute di wute ninge Herot nde opu mase ye te ane mo Jisas ningg mari, “Tisa, beghi nei bab nu wand nganye kin pene God ningg yumbo ur te wute bei kueny ye, di nu wute ni pughe sin ren kin te ningg nei kumo guab segi, nu wute nyamb kin o wute nyamb segi kin wand irene simbe gudiny.
40022017	Beghi simbe ndug, nu pughe gri nei guab? Beghi Sisar nde takis wong bad kin te tuquine o segi?”
40022018	Pudi Jisas ni nei namb ni yumbo ur brequ mand ningg bu ni nari, “Nungoqi wute nei tevi kin. Pughe kin ningg nungoqi nge wandoqi wundigh ei nge wand unje kap ningg wari?
40022019	Takis kin wet bidi ire te nge bei wegh.” Di ni wet bidi te miraq mandi meng.
40022020	Di Jisas ni pengu nindim nari, “Wuti tughe ngawu di nyamb ane wet bidi wen nde rise?”
40022021	Ni oyi mand mari, “Sisar te.” Di Jisas ni simbe nindim nari, “Yumbo Sisar ningg te Sisar weng, di God ningg te God weng.”
40022022	Ni wand ven mutungu, nei kumo mamb, di ni Jisas si meri di mo.
40022023	Sadyusi ni mari wute mati kin ni mune mes mewo segi ye. Nginy te ningg wute te kin Jisas nde mandi di ni pengu mindig mari,
40022024	“Tisa, Moses nari wuti iri wo segine nati, te ni kiqam ei mune kise ngam te nitaqi. Ni mune kise ngam te nitaqi, wo niraw di wo te kise nati kin ni te.
40022025	Muq beghi kise kiqam 7-pela pu mas. Kiseyu ngam no di nati, di ni wo segi, ni ngam kiqam nde si niraq pu wus.
40022026	Muq mingi ye tende dobu mune nitaqi, ni mune nati. Te tene ruso kiqam chumb mune nitaqi, ni mune natine.
40022027	Ninde pre dobu nyumbueg te wuti.
40022028	Kise kiqam 7-pela pu ni wute te mitaqi. Pugri bu otiwo wute mati kin mes mewo kin tende puayi tedi nyumbueg wen ni tughe ningg ngam ei wus?”
40022029	Pudi Jisas ni oyi nindim nari, “Nungoqi unje wap. Te pugri nungoqi God ningg wand buk pe rise kin di God ningg gre te nei wamb segi.
40022030	Wute mati kin mune mes mewo ye tende puayi ni ngam ruso o oyi oyi ngam mawo ruso segi. Ni angelo wam mas kin pugrine ris ye.
40022031	Di wute riti kin mune res riwo kin te ningg nungoqi God buk pe simbe nand kin te wuqond segi bri?
40022032	Ni nari, ‘Nge Abraham ningg God, Aisak ningg God di Jekop ningg God.’ God ni wute mati ye ni mingg God segi, ni wute urupuine mas ye ni mingg God.”
40022033	Wute buagi ni wand ven rutungu, di te ningg nei kumo rimb.
40022034	Parisi ni mutungu Jisas ni Sadyusi wand mand kin ngim imb nuam, di ni mandi irepene mikur.
40022035	Di wuti iri ni lo quan nei numbuw ye ni Jisas puamb nuang ningg bu ni pugri pengu nindig,
40022036	“Tisa, lo pughe ye bu yumbui?”
40022037	Di ni oyi nindig nari, “‘Nu Yumbui nunon God te ei nunde umbo pe, ququ pe gri, di nei pe yawo rang righe.’
40022038	Lo wen te quan nganye yumbui di lo ye wuwo kin.
40022039	Di aye tende dobu te pugri: ‘Nunon ghimbi yawo kurany righe kin pugrine wute aye yawo rany righe.’
40022040	Moses ningg lo di propet mingg wand nikin puate taq, wute aye yawo pirany righe di God yawo birag righe.”
40022041	Parisi irepene mikur pu yemu, di Jisas ni pengu nindim
40022042	nari, “Nungoqi Kraist ningg pughe gri nei wamb? Ni tughe ningg kuqo?” Ni oyi mindig mari, “Devit ningg kuqo.”
40022043	Ni oyi nindim nari, “Pughe gri ate Ququ Yuwon Ye Devit nei neng bu Devit wuti nen yumbui puq nindig? Devit ni puq nand,
40022044	‘Yumbui ni nge yumbui ningg nari, “Nge nde si tuan pene ghas ruso ruso nge nu veri nunde nyinge tingi kawo mas”.’
40022045	“Muq Devit nikinne ni yumbui puq nindig, tedi pughe gri ei ni Devit ningg kuqo?”
40022046	Wuti iri ni wand te oyi nindig tuqui segi. Di tende puayi pu ruso ni Jisas wand ire pengu mindig kin wune mamb.
40023001	Muq Jisas wute buagi di nikin wute ane wand simbe nindim nari,
40023002	“Wute lo wute bei meny kin di Parisi ane Moses ningg lo te bu simbe munduq.
40023003	Pugri bu wand pughe ye nungoqi meuq kin te wutungu di yembe wundiny. Pudi yumbo ur yembe mindiny kin te nungoqi yembe wundiny wayequ. Ni wand oghi kin simbe mand pudi nikinne yembe mindiny segi.
40023004	Ni yumbo ninge quan nganye mai ruwo kin wute nde sikar pe mirany righe, di ni rire kin tuqui segi. Pudi nikinne si timuepu iri nganye meri mondo musoq ghav mand segi.
40023005	Di ni yumbo ur buagi yembe mindiny ei wute ni ruqond ningg. Wute pripri God ningg wand mawo righe kin bokis te nikin quenge pe di si pe taq mamb. Ni bokis te kin yumbui ye taq mamb yawo kurem. Di ni sare dobui materi chongo dobui Yumbui pengu mindig ningg miraq wughe kin tende taq mamb.
40023006	Di ni mir yumbui pe mo di wute nyamb kin mas ye sunyi pe ei mas yawo kurem, di God yumbui nyamb mirang kin baj pe wute nyamb kin mas ye sunyi pe tende ei mas yawo kurem.
40023007	Di ni wute buagi pripri rikur kin sunyi pe tende mo di wute ni ei chumbuai kin wand rem yawo kurem. Di ni tisa puq rindim yawo kurem.
40023008	“Pudi wute nungoqi tisa puq runduq kin te wayequ, te pugri nungoqi Tisa irine, di nungoqi quan buagine kise kiqam wand.
40023009	Nungoqi nuyi irine wam nas, bu nungoqi wuti iri qi pe ven nde nungoqi wuyi puq wundig wayequ.
40023010	Wute nungoqi tisa puq runduq kin te wayequ, te pugri nungoqi tisa irine te Kraist.
40023011	Wuti tughe nungoqi nde yumbui ningg nas kin te ni nungoqi yembe ye iri.
40023012	Wuti tughe nikin nyambne nindivi viyo, tedi ni nyamb vighe viso, di wuti tughe nikin nyamb ni vighe viso, tedi ni nyamb yumbui natevi.”
40023013	-
40023014	Jisas ni mune simbe nand nari, “Nungoqi wutaqu lo wute bei weny kin di nungoqi Parisi otiwo nungoqi mai yumbui nganye ware. Nungoqi wutaqu nei tevi kin. Nungoqi wute God nde si nambu yeru kin te kin ngim nungoqi wute te imb wany. Nungoqi nonne war wo yambu wari, di wute rir ruso kin te nungoqi ngim imb wany.
40023015	“Nungoqi wutaqu lo wute bei weny kin di nungoqi Parisi otiwo nungoqi mai yumbui nganye ware. Nungoqi wutaqu nei tevi kin. Nungoqi war ir wonji nganye wo, ei wuti iri ni Juda ningg lo te simbe wundig nutungu. Di nungoqi lo simbe wundig di nungoqi ningg wand te kin pugri puq nen, tedi nungoqi wase pe wo kin pugrine ni mune wase pe no. Ni nungoqi mai wuraq kin pugrine ni oyi quan nganye niraq.
40023016	“Nungoqi rar chukoq kin, nungoqi wute ngim bei weny pudi nungoqi nonne ngim wundoq kin tuqui segi, otiwo nungoqi mai yumbui nganye ware. Te pugri nungoqi wute yeri wundiny wari, ‘Wuti God ningg baj pe wand ire gre neny, ni dobu puq nen segi te piyi. Pudi wuti iri God ningg baj ni gol tende pe wand gre neny, te ni puq nand kin pugrine ei puq nen.’
40023017	Nungoqi rar chukoq di ghabe gad! Yumbo pughe kin quan nganye yumbui? Gol God ningg baj wabe wur wus kin te yumbui segi, God ningg baj ni quan nganye yumbui di gol ni God ningg baj wabe wur wus kin te ningg bu ni anene yumbui.
40023018	Di nungoqi wari, ‘Wuti iri alta pe wand gre neny, ni dobu puq nen segi te piyi. Pudi wuti iri alta pe yumbo God meng kin tende pe wand gre neny, te puq nand kin pugrine ei puq nen.’
40023019	Nungoqi wutaqu rar chukoq kin. Yumbo alta pe mawo ris kin te yumbui segi. Alta ni quan nganye yumbui, di yumbo God meng kin ni alta pe ris kin te ningg bu ni anene yumbui.
40023020	Pugri bu wuti iri alta pe wand gre neny, tedi ni alta di yumbo buagi alta pe ris kin te anene wand gre neny.
40023021	Di wuti tughe God ningg baj pe wand ire gre neny, tedi God ningg baj di God tende nar nas kin ninde anene wand gre neny.
40023022	Di wuti tughe God nas kin tiqe tende pe ni wand ire gre neny, te God ningg sia pe bu wand gre neny, di God tende newo nas ye pe wand gre neny.
40023023	“Nungoqi wutaqu lo wute bei weny kin di nungoqi Parisi, nungoqi otiwo mai yumbui nganye ware. Nungoqi wutaqu nei tevi kin. Nungoqi lo wojiju kin te wat rise di wuny mbe kin minye buagi mint, dil, di kumin te nungoqi 10-pela pu mone wawo puch ire God weng. Pudi nungoqi lo yumbui kin te si ware pre. Taq pugri, nungoqi yumbo ur wute aye nde tuquine yembe wundiny, di wute yawo wutony, di God nei wumbig kin yumbo ur te yembe wundiny. Nungoqi lo yumbui kin te yembe wundiny, di lo aye te si ware segi kin.
40023024	Nungoqi wutaqu rar chukoq, nungoqi wute ngim bei weny ningg! Nungoqi te kin pugri, ase iri wuti iri nde minye wuye pe naghe pu yenu bu ni neti nowi meneri no. Pudi ni umo yumbui kin ire, kamel puq munduw kin, minye wuye pe wughe pu yequ kin te nundoq segi, ni minye wuye te ne di kamel anene naq wughe.
40023025	“Nungoqi wutaqu lo wute bei weny kin di nungoqi Parisi, otiwo nungoqi mai yumbui nganye ware ye! Nungoqi wutaqu nei tevi kin. Nungoqi kap nyeng ane dabo gri oghine wuye wap, pudi wabe gri te quan nganye puqum rimb. Te pugri nungoqi nyungu wand di nungoqi non ghimbine nei wumbiny kin tene nei wamb.
40023026	Nungoqi Parisi nungoqi rar chukoq kin! Nungoqi kap nyeng ane wabe gri wuye wap quem rimb pre, tedi dabo gri mune quemne rimb.
40023027	“Nungoqi wutaqu lo wute bei weny kin di nungoqi Parisi, nungoqi otiwo mai yumbui nganye ware ye. Nungoqi wutaqu nei tevi kin. Nungoqi wute riti mawo yeru kin ngamo qi quem kin pe nyang mamb kin pugri. Wute riti mawo yeru kin ngamo wam gri buqod kin yuwon, pudi wabe gri wute riti kin ngape mboq di sigh ane tende rir rise.
40023028	Nungoqi mune pugrine. Wute nungoqi ghimbi rundoqu riri nungoqi wutaqu yumbo ur tuquine puq wen ye. Pudi nungoqi nde umbo pe nei tevi kin yumbo ur di yumbo ur quan nganye brequ kin nungoqi nde umbo pe rise.
40023029	“Nungoqi wutaqu lo wute bei weny kin di nungoqi Parisi nungoqi otiwo mai yumbui nganye ware. Nungoqi wutaqu nei tevi kin. Nungoqi nonne propet te mati mawo yemu kin ngamo te yuwonne yembe wundiny, di wute yumbo ur tuquine yembe mand ye mati kin ngamo te yenji wupiny.
40023030	Di nungoqi wari, ‘Beghi koku ni mas kin tende puayi beghi pas, tedi beghi ni ghav bidim propet te pi mati segi.’
40023031	Wand ven nungoqi nonne bei wand, nungoqi wute propet mi mati kin ni mingg wo.
40023032	Be wo nungoqi nuqo yumbo ur brequ puq ren kin te mune yembe wundiny.
40023033	“Nungoqi ghati! Nungoqi ghati sindiyu wo! God nungoqi ir nuaqu di wase pe wo ye! Di nungoqi wu wase wo ye tuqui segi.
40023034	Te kin ningg di nge propet di wute nei oghi ye di wute lo bei munduq kin nungoqi nde tiqi gudom mondo ye. Ninge nungoqi wi mati, di kruse pe qungu wi mati, ninge nungoqi wutari wo God yumbui nyamb wurang kin baj pe yas wuany, di bub ware tiqe manyi te ruso ye.
40023035	Nungoqi pugri puq wen bu wute buagi ni wute tuquine ris ye qi pe ven nde ris kin te mambui riti kin mai te nungoqi wuraq ye. Nungoqi nuqo wute oghi ye mambui riti kin taq, Kein ni Abel ni nati kin tende pu rindi Sekaraia, Berekia ningg wo, ni God ningg baj opu di alta opu di tende mingi mi nati.
40023036	Nge nganyene nungoqi simbe guduq, mai te kin buagi nungoqi muq was kin ware ye.”
40023037	Di Jisas mune nari, “O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, nu propet te kui mati, di nu wute God tiqi nundom mondo kin te kuate mowi wet mekuram kui mati. Pripri nge nu wo ire pe kirur ningg, wapiqu kumo wo ngam wurany rindi nimbraqe nambu wirir kin pugri, pudi nu yambu kuari.
40023038	Nu tungu! God nu God ningg baj te si niraq di muq omone nganye yequ.
40023039	Nge nu simbe guduw, nu nge qoind segine ruso ruso nu nonne ghari, ‘God nu wuti Yumbui nde nyamb pe nandi kin nen yuwon wang’.”
40024001	Jisas ni God ningg baj si niraq no di nikin wute ninde mandi, ni baj buagi God ningg baj pe tende rise kin tende si mundub di Jisas simbe mindig.
40024002	Di ni oyi nindim nari, “Nungoqi yumbo ren wuqond? Nge nganyene nganye nungoqi simbe guduq, otiwo wute mandi baj ren bir mawo di wet men mune iri aye nde wam nas wuqoind segi ye. Ni quan buagine bir ir maghe di kin kin mas ye.”
40024003	Jisas ni newo no rand oliv ningg nas, nikin wute waghi grine mandi mari, “Beghi simbe ndug, pughe puayi bri nu yumbo kuari kin ren ruwi? Di yumbo ur pughe kin ye ruwo ei beghi buqod di nei bab nu mune guadi kin di ngeri pre kin te tumo rind?”
40024004	Di ni nari, “Nungoqi yeng wawo yuwon. Eti wute ninge mandi nungoqi wandoqi munduq di ni wand wutungu.
40024005	Te pugri wute wandoqi kin nganye buagi nge nde nyamb pe mandi di mari ni Kraist, di wute nganye buagi ni mingg wand rutungu.
40024006	Di nungoqi yeng wundi kin wand wutungu di yeng kin yumbo riri wutungu, pudi nungoqi te ningg wune wamb wayequ. Yumbo ren kin te ruwi ye, pudi ngeri pre kin te segine.
40024007	Kantri ire mes mewo kantri aye ane mege, di king iri nikin wute ane mes mewo di king aye nikin wute ane mege, di tiqe ninge pe mir segi. Di tiqe ninge pe titwuye naghe.
40024008	Yumbo ren kin te wute wo pe wuso ningg yuqo puate rew kughe kin pugri.
40024009	“Tende puayi nungoqi mitaqu mo unje mupuqu mai isis meuq, di mumbuequ wati, di nungoqi nge ningg wute pugri bu ni nge nyamb brequ mindigh ningg mari di nungoqi yambu mireuq.
40024010	Di ninge nge nei rimbigh kin te si rire, di ni kin kinne ker ruwo di ni kinne oyi oyi res ruwo veri nde si pe ri rundo.
40024011	Di wute ninge mandi wandoqi mand mari ni propet di wute nganye buagi wandoqi mindiny.
40024012	Di tiqe manyi wute nganye buagi yumbo ur brequ rind, pugri bu wute nganye buagi nganye ni wute yawo rirany righe kin nei te mune gre rind segi.
40024013	Pudi wute tughe ni gre pu yeru ruso ruso ngeri pre, tedi God ni nateri.
40024014	Di wute God nde si nambu yeru kin wand yuwon ye ven tiqe buagi qi pe ven nde yeru kin tende wute buagi simbe mindiny rutungu pre muqdi ngeri pre ye.
40024015	“Nungoqi otiwo wuqond yumbo brequ nganye God ningg baj brequ wunduw ye ire yequ. Ni puq wen kin te asi propet iri Daniel puq mindig kin ni simbe nand ye ane tuquine.” (Nu wuti wand ven guqod ye nu wand puate ei oghine nei mbiny.)
40024016	“Te muqdi wute Judia opu ris kin te wu rise rand pe ei riwo ruso.
40024017	Wuti baj wam nas kin ni mune baj pe nar no yumbo ninge nateri wayequ. Ni brequne wu nase no.
40024018	Wuti iri wuny mbe yenu kin mune nambu no chongo aye nitaqwi wayequ. Ni brequne wu nase no.
40024019	Tende puayi nyumbueg wo ane ris kin di ninge ni wo wokuandi ne ris ye ni mai quan nganye rire ye.
40024020	Nungoqi God pengu wundig ei yumbo ren kin ngeri uyi kin o Sabat kin nginy tende puayi puq ren segi.
40024021	Te pugri asi God qi di yumbo buagi yembe nindiny kin tende puayi pu rindi muq mai yumbui ren kin rindi segi. Di otiwo mune mai ren kin segi.
40024022	Yumbui ni wute mai rire kin ngeri te pend nawo puayi rise segi, tedi wuti iri ni gre nand nas tuqui segi. Pudi ni wute nap ruso kin ni ningg nari bu ngeri te pend nawo puayi rise.
40024023	Tende puayi wuti iri nandi nari, ‘Kraist nen yenu.’ O nari, ‘Ni te no yenu.’ Nungoqi ni wand te wutungu wayequ.
40024024	Te pugri Kraist wandoqi kin di propet wandoqi kin ni mandi di yumbo ur gre ye isis yembe mindiny. Ni puq men ei tuqui tedi wute Yumbui nap ruso kin te wandoqi mindiny di ir righe.
40024025	Nungoqi wutungu. Nge yumbo buagi ren ningg muqne simbe guduq pre otiwo yumbo te kin puq ren.
40024026	“Muq ni nungoqi ningg mari, ‘Te wuqond, ni wuye di nyumo segi ye pe tende yenu.’ Nungoqi tende wo wayequ. Muq ni mari, ‘Te wuqond, ni tende suqo pu yenu.’ Nungoqi wand te wutungu wayequ.
40024027	Wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni nandi ningg tedi ti pris kin pugri nginy nawi opu ti nase tene rindi ruso nginy naghe no opu di wute buagi ni ruqoind.
40024028	Ni nandi kin taq pugri, umo riti kin ni muainde rise te wapi ambojig ni mandi tendene mikur.
40024029	“Mai yumbui ren ruso pre, brequne nginy burpoq nap, di irew mune ti wuri segi, di tomnji nginy tu pe pu bi ir mi, di yumbo gre kin nginy tu pe yeru kin tit rip.
40024030	Tende puayi di wute buagi qi pe kin ni ruqond wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas kin nikin ur nginy tu pe ruwi di ni quanji rind. Di ni ruqond wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas kin ni wuye quari pe gre di ti yumbui ane nandi.
40024031	Di angelo biugel piq nuqoind quan nganye nari, di ni nikin angelo tiqi nundom tiqe buagi mo nikin wute ni nap ruso pre kin te mirur. Angelo ni tiqe manyi wute materi ruso ruso qi cheq pene, di ni mitari mandi.
40024032	“Nungoqi nyumo fig ni yumbo ur te wuqond di tende pu nei wateri di nei wamb tuqui. Nyumo fig ni muange te uyi mare di raqe riyi tedi nungoqi nei wamb te wuye wundi kin ngeri te muq tumo rind.
40024033	Te kin pugrine otiwo yumbo nge simbe gad ye te puq ren, tedi nungoqi nei wamb te pugri wuti God nde pu nandi kin ni mune nandi kin ngeri te tumo nganye rind, ni ngimrawu ne yenu.
40024034	Nge nungoqi nganyene simbe guduq, wute tit muq ris kin ren ni riti segi, risne di yumbo te kin puq ren.
40024035	Nginy tu di qi ane ni pre ye, pudi nge wand te pre segi ye.
40024036	“Pudi wuti iri ni nei namb pughe puayi o aua pughe ye tende ei wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni mune nandi kin te ni nei namb segi. Angelo buagi wam kin ni mune nei mamb segi, God ningg wo mune nei namb segi, wuyi irine nei namb.
40024037	Yumbo ur Noa ni nas kin tende puayi puq men kin te muq wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni mune nandi kin mune pugrine puq men.
40024038	Yabe wuye nime yumbui nase segine, wute mir rind wuye riq, wute ngam ruso, tetene ruso ruso Noa ni at pe nar no,
40024039	di wute ni nei tuan rimb pu ris kin tende puayi wuye nime yumbui nase nandi ni quan buagine nare no. Te kin pugrine wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni mune nandi kin ngeri te mune pugrine.
40024040	Wute temi wuny mbe yembe mand, ni nandi iri neti nowi di iri yenu.
40024041	Nyumbueg teri plaua bret yembe runduw kin te kin yembe rind rind yeru, ni nandi ire nitaqi no di ire pugrine yequ.
40024042	Pugri bu nungoqi yeng wawo yuwon, te pugri nungoqi Yumbui mune nandi kin ngeri te nungoqi nei wamb segi.
40024043	Nungoqi yumbo ur ren nei wumbiny. Muq baj kiyi nei namb bur pughe ye te ningg ei wuti nyungu ye nandi ni baj bir nuang ningg, tedi ni yeng nawo di wuti nyungu kin ni baj bir nawo nar no segi.
40024044	Te kin pugrine nungoqi mune yeng wawo yuwon, te pugri nungoqi nginy nei wumbig segi kin tende puayi di wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni mune nandi.
40024045	“Wuti yembe ye ni nei oghi ye rise di ni yembe nikin yumbui neng kin te oghine yembe nand, bu nikin yumbui ni si numbog yembe ye aye te yeng nuany di mir rind kin puayi mir neny.
40024046	Wuti te otiwo nikin yumbui nandi nuqoind ni yembe nand nandne nas, tedi ni chumbuai nand.
40024047	Nge nganyene nganye nungoqi simbe guduq, yumbui ni yembe ye wuti te si numbog di ni yumbo yumbo buagi yeng nuany ye.
40024048	Pudi yembe ye wuti te ni wuti brequ di ni nari, ‘Nge yumbui brequne nandi segi ye,’
40024049	di yembe ye ni yeng nuany kin te pug nindiny, di ni wute wuye kumo me kin te ane mir mand di wuye me.
40024050	Muq wuti te ni yumbui nandi kin nginy te ni yeng nawo segi, di aua pughe ye nandi kin te ni nei namb segi,
40024051	di ni nandi mai neng, tiqi nundog no wute nei tevi kin te ane mas. Tende wute quanji mand di sawo mat ki ye.”
40025001	Jisas ni mune simbe nand nari, “Tende puayi yumbo buagi God nde si nambu rise kin te nyumbueg ambonye 10-pela kin pugri. Ni lam rind rire ruso, wuti iri ngam urupui no kin te ghimbi ruang pu yeru, ni nandi ei ane ngam urupui ruso kin mir pe tende ruso ningg.
40025002	Nyumbueg ambonye 5-pela ni nei segi, di 5-pela ni nei oghi ye rimb.
40025003	Nyumbueg nei segi kin ni lam rind rire, pudi wel aye rire segi.
40025004	Nyumbueg nei oghi kin ni wel aye lam ane rire.
40025005	Wuti te ngam urupui no kin ni brequ nandi segi, pugri bu ni ruqoi kureny, yabe ruqo rise.
40025006	“Burpoq mingi wuti iri pugri nari, ‘Wuti ngam urupui no kin be nandi. Nungoqi wandi po, ngimi buqoid, muqdi pitanyi badi.’
40025007	Muq nyumbueg ambonye buagi res riwo, ni lam wik te mune rindiri riwo.
40025008	Di nyumbueg nei segi kin te ni ninge nei oghi kin te ningg riri, ‘Beghi wel puch wengu lam pe pawo righe, beghi lam awu ruso.’
40025009	Pudi nei oghi kin oyi riri, ‘Nungoqi mune peuq tedi beghi tuqui segi. Nungoqi wo, stua pe nungoqi non tene wong wand.’
40025010	Di ni wel wong rind yamb ruso pu yeru, wuti ngam urupui no kin nandi, ninge te ni ghimbi ruang pu ris kin te ni nitari anene ngam kin mir yumbui tende rir ruso, di ni ngim miraq wughe.
40025011	Dobu pu ninge te rindi riri, ‘Yumbui, yumbui, beghi ngim bi wangu.’
40025012	Pudi ni oyi nand nari, ‘Nge nganyene nganye nungoqi simbe guduq, nge nungoqi nei gubuq segi.’
40025013	“Pugri bu nungoqi yeng wawo pune ei was. Nginy pughe ye te ningg di aua pughe ye te ningg ei nungoqi non Yumbui nandi te nungoqi nei wamb segi.
40025014	“Wute buagi God nde si nambu yeru kin taq pugri: wuti iri ni wonji no ningg nikin yembe ye nari mandi, di ni yumbo buagi te bir nawo ni nem ei ni yeng muany.
40025015	Ni yembe ye wute ni yembe mand kin ane tuquine ire ire nem. Ni wuti iri 5,000 kina neng, iri 2,000 kina neng, di aye iri 1,000 kina neng, pre muq ni tiqe aye pe no.
40025016	Wuti iri ni 5,000 kina nat rise kin te ni brequne no, bisnis yembe nand, aye mune 5,000 kina nateri.
40025017	Pugrine wuti 2,000 kina nat rise kin te ni mune bisnis yembe nand aye mune 2,000 kina nateri.
40025018	Pudi wuti 1,000 kina nat rise kin te nikin yumbui ningg wet bidi te nare no qi ngamo nuaq suqo nare.
40025019	“Muq dobu nikin yumbui mune nandi di nikin yembe ye te nuqond ni wet bidi pughe sin bri men.
40025020	Wuti 5,000 kina nat rise kin te nandi, rar ngimine yenu, ni 5,000 kina aye narene nandi muq nari, ‘Yumbui, nu nge 5,000 kina kuegh, muq nge 5,000 kina aye ren mune kateri.’
40025021	Nikin yumbui oyi nand nari, ‘Nu yembe ye wuti oghi di nu yuwonne yembe guad ye. Nu yumbo wokuandi nganye yeng kuany. Muqdi nge nu yumbo quan kew nu yeng wany. Nu ghandi nge nunon yumbui ane chumbuai bad.’
40025022	“Wuti 2,000 kina nat rise kin ni mune nandi nari, ‘Yumbui, nu nge 2,000 kina kuegh, muq nge 2,000 kina aye ren mune kateri.’
40025023	Nikin yumbui oyi nand nari, ‘Nu yembe ye wuti oghi di nu yuwonne yembe guad ye. Nu yumbo wokuandi nganye yeng kuany. Muqdi nge nu yumbo quan kew nu yeng wany. Muq nu ghandi nge nunon yumbui ane chumbuai bad.’
40025024	“Muq wuti 1,000 kina nat rise kin mune nandi, rar ngimine yenu, muq nari, ‘Yumbui, nge nei gab nu wute aye yawo kutony segi ye. Nu mir wute aye mi righe kin te bi kuawo ye. Wute aye ni mir yi mi righe kin te nu mir tende kuateri,
40025025	pugri bu nge wune gab, di nge nu 1,000 kina ren kare ko, qi pe suqo kare. Te qond, nu wet bidi taq ren.’
40025026	Pudi nikin yumbui oyi nand nari, ‘Nu yembe ye wuti brequ. Nu yembe ye kuen si yavi quang. Nu kuari nge wute aye mir mi righe kin te nge bi kawo, di nge ko wute aye mir yi memare kin te kateri.
40025027	Pughe kin ningg nge wet bidi kuare kuo, wet bidi baj pe kuawo righe segi, te ei nge mune gadi di nge wet bidi kateri, di aye ninge megh ane.
40025028	Muq nungoqi ni wet bidi wutangri, wuti aye 10,000 kina rise kin te ni weng.
40025029	Te pugri wute tughe ni yumbo ninge rise pre, tedi nge yumbo aye ninge keny, di ni yumbo quan rise. Muq wute tughe ni yumbo segi, ni musoqne rise, tedi nge mune ninde pu kateri.
40025030	Yembe ye wuti brequ nen wutanyi wo, burpoq pe meweri naghe. Tende wute ni quanji rind di sawo rit ki ye’.”
40025031	“Otiwo wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni king kin pugri ei nikin ti yumbui ane nandi, di angelo buagi ane mandi, di ni sia king pe wam kin ti yumbui ane nas.
40025032	Tende ni wute buagi tiqe manyi kin mitari mandi ninde rar ngimine yeru, di ni wute ir nawo, wuti sipsip yeng nuany kin ni sipsip di meme ir nawo kin pugri.
40025033	Ni sipsip si nganye pe opu nawo yeru, di meme si qaqi pe opu nawo yeru.
40025034	Di king ni wute ninde si nganye pe opu yeru kin te simbe nindiny nari, ‘Nungoqi nge wuyi yuwon nuauq pre ye nungoqi ren wandi. Asi qi urupuine kin tende puayi ni nungoqi yumbo yuwon ye manyi nunduq pre ye. Nungoqi wandi yumbo te kin wateri.
40025035	Te pugri nge mir kuregh di nungoqi nge mir wegh, nge yawo singar kati di nungoqi nge wuye wegh, nge wuti aye kin di nungoqi nge wutanyi baj pe wo,
40025036	nge chongo segi di nungoqi nge chongo wegh, nge num kuregh di nungoqi nge yeng wagh, nge taq pu yengu di nungoqi wandi nge wuqoind.’
40025037	“Di wute tuquine ris ye oyi rind riri, ‘Yumbui, pughe puayi beghi nu buqoid nu mir ane kuas di beghi mir pew? Di pughe puayi nu yawo singar kuati di beghi nu wuye pew?
40025038	Di pughe puayi beghi nu buqoid nu aye kin di beghi pitanyi baj pe po, o pughe puayi nu chongo segi di beghi chongo pew?
40025039	Di pughe puayi beghi nu buqoid nu num kurew di beghi nu yeng puaw, o pughe puayi nu taq yengu di beghi badi nu buqoid’?”
40025040	“Di king ni oyi nindiny nari, ‘Nge nganyene nganye nungoqi simbe guduq, qam ren kin iri nyamb segi kin ninde yumbo ur puq wen kin te nge bu puq wegh.’
40025041	“Muq wute si qaqi pe yeru kin te simbe nindiny nari, ‘Nungoqi kring wo, God nungoqi brequ nunduq ye. Nungoqi wase awu kuso segi ye pe tende wo, Satan di ni angelo brequ te ane ni mingg bu wase kuen nawo kughe pu yengu.
40025042	Te pugri nge mir kuregh di nge mir wegh segi, nge yawo singar kati di nungoqi nge wuye wegh segi,
40025043	nge aye kin di nungoqi nge wutanyi baj pe wo segi, nge chongo segi di nungoqi nge chongo wegh segi, nge num kuregh di taq yengu di nungoqi wandi nge ghav wundigh segi.’
40025044	“Di ni oyi rind riri, ‘Yumbui, pughe puayi beghi nu buqoid nu mir ane yengu, o yawo singar kuati, o nu wuti aye kin, o nu chongo segi, o nu num kurew, o nu taq yengu di beghi nu yumbo ghav buduw segi?’
40025045	“Di ni oyi nindiny nari, ‘Nge nganyene nganye nungoqi simbe guduq, nungoqi qam ren kin iri ni nyamb segi kin ninde yumbo ur pugri ye puq wen segi te nge bu puq wegh segi.’
40025046	Di ni ruso yuqo pre segi ye pe tende yuqo riraq ris ris te kin ris, pudi wute tuquine ris kin ni ruso yuwon pu ris ris te kin ris kin tende ruso.”
40026001	Jisas ni wand buagi te simbe nand omone nawo pre, muq nikin wute pugri simbe nindim nari,
40026002	“Nungoqi nei wamb nginy temi mo pre dobu di asi God ni Israel mingg wo rar nuqond mas kin ngeri te nei bibiny ye. Tende puayi di ni nge, wuti God nde pu gadi wuti nganye kas ye, nge veri nde si pe mi godo, di kruse pe qungu mi kati.”
40026003	Di tende puayine prist mingg yumbui di Israel mingg quayi kiyi ni mo prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui, Kaiapas puq mindig kin, ninde baj yumbui pe mikur,
40026004	di ni wand taq mamb ei waghi grine Jisas mait nase, di mi nati ningg.
40026005	Pudi mari, “Beghi yumbo ren kin ngeri yumbui nei bibiny kin tende puayi puq pen wayequ. Beghi puq pen tedi wute buagi beghi ker ruangu.”
40026006	Jisas ni Betani wuti iri Saimon, wuti asi leprosi niraq kin, ninde baj pe nas.
40026007	Di nyumbueg ire wel yuwon nganye iri botol ane wuri wundi. Wel te wet bidi quan pe wong wuind. Botol te wet yuwon nganye iri, alabasta puq mindig kin tende pe yembe mindig ye. Jisas ni mir nand nand nas di nyumbueg te wel wuri wundo, Jisas nde ngawu pe groq wundig.
40026008	Pudi tende puayi Jisas ningg wute ninge ni te muqond, ni umbo brequ kuse, di mari, “Pughe kin ningg ni wel nen unje wuip?
40026009	Beghi wute aye pem wong maind, tedi nen ningg beghi wet bidi quan pateri, di wute yumbo segi kin te peny.”
40026010	Pudi Jisas ni nei te nundom pre, pugri bu ni simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi ni rar wundoq. Pughe ningg nungoqi ni yumbo puq wen kin te ningg segi puq wand? Ni yumbo ur oghi ye nge nde yembe wundiny.
40026011	Wute yumbo segi kin nungoqi ane was ye, pudi nge nungoqi ane pas nganye segi ye.
40026012	Nyumbueg wen ni wel nge nde ghimbi pe groq wuind kin te ni nge ghimbi muqne sabi wundiny pu ei otiwo nge ngamo pe ko ye.
40026013	Nge nungoqi nganyene simbe guduq te pugri otiwo wute mo tiqe buagi te wand yuwon ye bir mawo kin tende puayi wute wen ni yumbo yembe wundiny kin ren anene simbe mand ye. Ni pugri puq men ei nyumbueg yumbo ren yembe wundiny kin wen anene nei rumbuw.”
40026014	Tende puayi Jisas nikin wute 12-pela kin iri, Judas Iskariot puq mindig kin, ni no prist mingg yumbui te nuqond,
40026015	di nari, “Nge Jisas nungoqi nde si pe ki nondo, tedi nungoqi nge yumbo pughe kin ei wegh?” Di ni wong maind silva puch 30-pela pu meng.
40026016	Di tende puayine Judas ni Jisas veri nde si pe ni nondo kin ngim meri nat.
40026017	Muq Juda ni bret yis segi kin riq ye nginy ye nawo ye tende puayi Jisas nikin wute ninde mandi di pengu mindig mari, “Nu nei guab ye beghi muainde ei mir yembe bidiny, di nu guadi ane mir bad ei God asi Israel mingg wo rar nuqond mas kin ngeri te nei bibiny?”
40026018	Ni oyi nand nari, “Nungoqi wo, tiqe yumbui pe wuti te nas kin te simbe wundig wari, ‘Tisa nari, nge ngeri tumo rind. Nge ngening wute ane nunde baj pe ei pikur di God ni asi Israel mingg wo rar nuqond mas kin ngeri te nei bibiny ningg mir bad ye’.”
40026019	Di Jisas nikin wute ni nari kin pugrine puq men, di ni mir te kin yembe mindiny.
40026020	Di yuram ni nikin wute 12-pela pu ane tebol pe mas,
40026021	di ni mir mand mand mas di ni nari, “Nge nungoqi nganyene simbe guduq, nungoqi kin iri ni nge veri nde si pe ni godo ye.”
40026022	Di ni quan nganye yivany mare, di ni ire ire pengu mindig mari, “Yumbui, nu nge ningg bri kuari?”
40026023	Ni oyi nand nari, “Wuti nge temu nyeng ire pe si pawo righe kin ni di nge veri nde si pe ni godo ye.
40026024	Wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni nati kin te God ningg buk puq wund kin pugrine ei nati ye. Pudi wuti pughe ye ni wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni veri nde si pe ni nondo kin ni mai yumbui nganye niraq ye. Wuti te kin kumo wuri wundi segi tedi yuwon nganye.”
40026025	Judas wuti Jisas veri nde si pe ni nondo ye ni nari, “Tisa, nu nge ningg bri kuari?” Ni oyi nindig nari, “Nu tuquine guad.”
40026026	Ni mir mand mand mas, di Jisas ni bret nitaqwi, Yumbui chumbuai nindig pre, bir nuaq nikin wute te nem di nari, “Bret wen wutaqwi waq, wen nge ghimbi.”
40026027	Te pre muq ni wain mune kap ane neti nowi, Yumbui chumbuai nindig pre, nem di nari, “Nungoqi buagi ane we.
40026028	Nen nge yavi di yavi wen te God asi Moses ane wand taq mamb kin te gre weny. Di yavi wen te ir wi ei wute nganye buagi yumbo ur brequ kin wand te puaq.
40026029	Nge nungoqi simbe guduq, nge wain nen mune ke segi segine ruso ruso otiwo nge nungoqi ane yumbo yumbo buagi nge wuyi nde si nambu yeru kin tende pas di wain urupui pe.”
40026030	Muq ni yuwo ire mari di tiqe yumbui te si miraq, di rand iri Oliv puq mindig kin tende mo.
40026031	Muq Jisas ni pugri simbe nindim nari, “Muq bur kuen gug yumbo ninge nge nde ruwi di nungoqi ir waghe ye. Te pugri God ningg buk pe pugri ur mand mari, ‘Nge wuti sipsip yeng nuany kin te ki di sipsip bure ire ire ruso ye.’
40026032	Pudi dobu nge kes kewo, di nge ye kawo Galili ko di nungoqi waru.”
40026033	Di Pita nes newo Jisas ningg nari, “Piyi wute buagi yumbo nunde ruwi kin te muqond di ni ir maghe, pudi nge ir kaghe tuqui segi.”
40026034	Di Jisas oyi nindig nari, “Nge nu nganyene simbe guduw, muq bur wapiqu nari segine di nu ghari nu nge nei gubigh segi puq ghand tevi ire pu ghand ye.”
40026035	Pudi Pita oyi Jisas oyi nindig nari, “Piyi, nge nu temune pati ye, nge kari nge nu nei gubuw segi ye puq gad tuqui segi.” Di Jisas nikin wute quan buagine pugrine puq mand.
40026036	Muq Jisas nikin wute ane mong puch ire Getsemani puq munduw kin tende mo, di ni nikin wute simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi ven ne was, nge tende ko God pengu gidig.”
40026037	Di ni Pita di Sebedi ningg wo temi te ane nitami no. Ni misoqne kring mondo, di ni umbo mai kuyo, di ni nutungu ghave rimb.
40026038	Muq ni pugri simbe nindim nari, “Nge umbo mai kuyo di nge ghimbi kutungu ghave rimb, nge kati ningg tumo. Nungoqi ven nde was nge ane yeng pawo.”
40026039	Di ni musoqne kring nondo wonji pugri yenu, muq ni qi pe me no nase, God pengu nindig nari, “Nge wuyi, nu tuqui tedi nge yuqo kiraq ye kap wen taqwi. Pudi nge kari kin wand te tungu segi, nu non nei pene.”
40026040	Di ni mune nandi, nikin wute nuqond ni ruqo pu mase, di ni Pita ningg nari, “Pughe gri ate nungoqi nge ane yeng pawo ruso aua ire segi?
40026041	Yeng wawo, di God pengu wundig ei Satan nungoqi wandoqi nunduq kin tende puayi nungoqi ir waghe segi. Nungoqi umbo yumbo yembe gudiny ningg kuri, pudi ghimbi buid segi.”
40026042	Ni munene no God pengu nindig nari, “Wuyi, nu nei guab kin yuqo kiraq kin te yuwon, tedi nu kuari kin pugrine puq yen.”
40026043	Di ni mune nandi nuqond nikin wute ruqo pune mase. Te pugri ni rar mai riwo.
40026044	Muq ni si nare mase, di ni mune no mining kin pugrine God pengu nindig, ni wand asi nand kin tene mune simbe nand.
40026045	Muq ni nandi nikin wute nuqond, di ni pugri simbe nindim nari, “Nungoqi ruqo pune ei wase ye bri? Te wuqond, wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni meti nowi wute yumbo ur brequ mand kin nde si pe mi nondo ye ngeri taq tumo rind pre.
40026046	Wes wewo, be po. Wuti nge veri nde si pe ni godo kin taq tumo nandi pre.”
40026047	Jisas ni wand nand nandne yenu, Judas nandi. Prist mingg yumbui ninge di Juda mingg quayi kiyi ni wute nganye buagi tiqi mundom mame bidi di wase puayi ane mare Judas nde dobu maru. (Judas ni Jisas nikin wute 12-pela kin iri.)
40026048	Muq wuti nen Jisas nikin veri nde si pe ni nondo kin yumbo ur bei nindim kin te simbe nindim nari, “Wuti nge song gireg kin te wait nase.”
40026049	Di ni Jisas nde tuquine nondo di nari, “Bur oghi Tisa!” Di ni song nireng.
40026050	Jisas oyi Judas simbe nindig nari, “Mand, nu yumbo pughe yembe gudiny ningg guadi kin te nu puq yen.” Di wute aye te mandi Jisas mait nase.
40026051	Di Jisas ningg wuti iri ni mame dobui qo naimb di prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui ni yembe ye wuti te iri ange di nuang ir wi.
40026052	Di Jisas ni simbe nindig nari, “Mame dobui mune nikin chongo pe yi ndighe. Wute buagi mame pe yeng mand tedi mame oyi namb mati.
40026053	Nge te ningg kari, tedi nge wuyi pengu gidig di brequne ni angelo nganye buagi tiqi nundom mandi, nge ghav mindigh di wute men ni ane tuqui segi. Nu te kin nei guab segi bri?
40026054	Nge ni pengu gidig kin tuqui, pudi nge te kin pugri puq ken, tedi pughe gri ei God ningg buk puq wund kin te ane tuquine? Yumbo buagi ren God ningg buk wuri kin pugrine ei nge nde puq ren ye.”
40026055	Tende puayine Jisas ni wute buagi te simbe nindim nari, “Nge wute kitami yeng pe bri badi bu nungoqi mame dobui di wase puayi ane ware nge wait kase ningg wandi? Nginy manyi manyi nge God ningg baj pe tende kas di wute wand bei keny. Nungoqi nge pughe ningg tendene wait kase segi?
40026056	Pudi yumbo ur ren kin pugrine puq ren ei propet ni ur mand kin ane tuquine.” Di Jisas nikin wute buagi ni si meri wu mase mo.
40026057	Wute Jisas mait nase mitanyi prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui Kaiapas nde mo, di wute lo wute bei meny kin di quayi kiyi ni tende mas.
40026058	Di Pita Jisas nde dobu wonjine naru, di prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui ni baj kin imb pe nar no. Wute tende yeng mawo pu yemu kin te ane mas, ei ni nuqond Jisas pughe sin bri meng.
40026059	Prist mingg yumbui di kaunsil buagi ni wute ninge meri mand ei ni wand ghav mindim di Jisas wandoqi mindig ei ni mi nati.
40026060	Wute nganye buagi mandi Jisas wandoqi mindig, pudi ni mi nati kin ngim ire mundoq segi. Dobu pu wute aye temi mandi,
40026061	di mari, “Wuti nen nari, ‘Nge God ningg baj wen bir kuaq di nginy temi ire pune di mune yembe guduw omo kuaq kin tuqui’.”
40026062	Muq prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui nes newo Jisas ningg nari, “Nu ni wand te oyi gudim segi ye bri? Wand ven wute men nunde memiraw viyo kin te puate pughene?”
40026063	Pudi Jisas ni wand nand segi. Di prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui ni simbe nindig nari, “Nge God nganyene nas kin ninde rar pe nu simbe guduw, di nu wand nganyene ei simbe ghand. Nu Kraist bri? Nu God ningg wo bri?”
40026064	Jisas ni oyi nindig nari, “Te nganye, nu simbe guad kin pugrine. Pudi nge nungoqi simbe guduq. Otiwo nungoqi wuti God nde pu nandi wuti nganye nas ye ni God gre quan nganye rise ye ninde si tuan pe opu nas di God nde tiqe pe pu wuye quari wam nandi wuqoind ye.”
40026065	Prist mingg yumbui mingg yumbui ni wand ven nutungu, nikin chongo bir nuaq nari, “Nen God wand brequ nindig. Pughe kin ningg beghi wute aye mune pari mandi ni yumbo ur yembe nindiny kin te simbe mand? Muq tene nungoqi wutungu ni God wand brequ nindig.
40026066	Nungoqi pughe gri nei wamb?” Ni oyi mand mari, “Ni unje nap pre, ni nati tedi oghi.”
40026067	Muq ni quenge pe sombaqe miping, di si mung mamb pug mindig. Ninge si bure mand kowisambe dang mindig,
40026068	di mari, “Nu nganyene nganye Kraist, ate God nde pu nei ghatevi beghi simbe ndug, wuti tughe bu nu ni?”
40026069	Muq Pita baj dabo gri nas, di yembe ye nyumbueg ire ninde wundi wuri, “Nu anene Jisas Galili kin ni ningg wuti iri.”
40026070	Pudi wute buagi nde rar pe Pita segi puq nand nari, “Nge nei gab segi, nu pughe puq guad.”
40026071	Muq ni no, ngimrawu ne yenu di nyumbueg aye ire ni wuqoind, ni wute buagi te simbe wundiny wuri, “Wuti nen ni Jisas Nasaret kin ni ane ye.”
40026072	Di Pita mune segi puq nand nari, “Nge God nde rar pe kari nge wuti nen nei gibig segi!”
40026073	Ni yenu big rip pu wute ninde tumo yemu kin ni mandi Pita pugri simbe mindig mari, “Nganyene nganye, nu nikin iri. Nu wand guad kin gibe te nu bei rind.”
40026074	Muq Pita ni wand gre neny, puq nand nari, “Nganyene wam ye nei namb, nge wuti nen nei gibig segi. Pudi nge wandoqi gad ate God nge brequ nindigh.” Ni puq nand pre brequne di wapiqu nari.
40026075	Di Pita ni asi Jisas puq nand kin te mune nei nimbiny. Jisas nari, “Wapiqu nari segine nu ghari nu nge nei gubigh segi puq ghand tevi ire pu ghand ye.” Pita wand ven nei nimbiny, di dabo nar no, yumbui quanji kiyi nand.
40027001	Burane ne prist mingg yumbui di quayi kiyi buagi wand taq mamb ei Jisas mi nati ningg.
40027002	Ni taq maimb di mitanyi mo gavman kin yumbui, Pailat, ninde si pe mi nondo.
40027003	Judas, wuti Jisas veri nde si pe ni nondo ye, ni nuqond kot pe ni wand taq mamb ei Jisas mi nati ningg. Di ni yivany nirang di wet bidi silva pe kin 30-pela pu prist mingg yumbui di quayi kiyi meng kin te mune nare no nem.
40027004	Di ni pugri puq nand nari, “Nge yumbo ur brequ gad pre. Wuti nge nungoqi nde si pe ki nondo kin te ni yumbo ninge unje nap segi di nungoqi wi nati.” Pudi ni oyi mand mari, “Te beghi pughe sin ei pen? Nu non nde nei pene.”
40027005	Di ni wet bidi te God ningg baj pe tende menare ruso ris, di ni nyinge nare no. Ni no, di nikinne pori naghe nati.
40027006	Pudi prist mingg yumbui ni wet bidi te materi mari, “Ren yavi kin wet bidi, pugri bu beghi lo wuri wet bidi ren God ningg baj kin wet bidi ane pawo ris segi ye.”
